context: Hydrological rhythm refers to the periodicity of the lake's water regime with changes in rhythm.The generalized hydrological rhythm includes day and night, monthly transport, seasonal and interannual rhythms.Under normal circumstances, the average water level of the lake for many years is stable due to factors such as the basin's climate and the underlying surface.The value tends to be stable, that is, the normal average annual water level of the lake.Therefore, the interannual rhythm of the lake is characterized by the mutation-driven by disturbance factors and the stability of the stage after adaptation to disturbance, and there is no gradual trend.Hydrological rhythm refers specifically to the monthly rhythm and seasonal rhythm.

context: People who claim that the plant is conscious and emotional often use the American Baxter experiment.Baxter connected a polygraph to the leaves of a pot of plants.The design principle of this polygraph is that people are lying At that time, due to tension, the skin will sweat, resulting in a decrease in skin resistance.By measuring changes in skin resistance, you can discern other people's emotions, and then determine whether a person is lying.Baxter reported that when the main test in the experiment thought "I want to burn off When the "leaf", the polygraph responded violently, the pointer suddenly moved to the top of the meter and showed continuous fierce fluctuations, and the polygraph drew a pattern similar to that that would appear when people were in extreme fear.Baxter claimed from this: Plants are emotional.
Answer: A.Even Baxter cannot repeat the experiment steadily, and Baxter's explanation of the success and failure of the experiment is unconvincing

context: Due to genetic mutations in the cells, the cells proliferate and differentiate uncontrollably, and eventually, develop into malignant tumors.There are many abnormal proteins encoded by the mutant genes on the surface of cancer cells.It stands to reason that these abnormal proteins should be recognized by the body's immune system in time.It triggers an immune response to clear the cancer cells in one fell swoop.However, due to the rapid development of tumor cells, they are extremely camouflaged and constantly mutate.In the face of fierce and witty tumor cells, the originally powerful immune cells also seem to be "inadequate", and they may even Some tumor cells are "ignoring".The immunosuppression formed in the tumor microenvironment has even paralyzed the immune system.

At a deeper level, the role of "coach" requires leaders to have the qualities of a psychologist and an educator, which is also difficult for ordinary people.Have it.
Answer: A.Inefficiency, over leadership?

context: In the eight-hour workday, the average effective work time is about six hours.If one does not work hard, it is likely that the effective work time is only four hours a day; but if another person works hard, he must never Most of my thoughts are on work.Even after work hours, my mind is constantly thinking about things at work, generating new ideas, thinking about solutions to problems, etc.On the same day, it may be possible to accumulate work equivalent to +2 hours Experience, long-term, then two people work the same for ten years.The former may only accumulate work experience equivalent to six or seven years, but the latter already has work experience equivalent to twenty years.
Answer: A.Habit

context: British scientists point out that above Antarctica, the top of the fugitive layer in the atmosphere has fallen by about 8 kilometers in the past 40 years.Above Europe, similar observations have been made.Scientists believe that the atmosphere may continue to contract due to the greenhouse effect In the 21st century, carbon dioxide concentrations are expected to increase several times, which will shrink the space boundary by 20 kilometers, and continue to reduce the density of the thermal ionosphere in areas above the dissipative layer.
Answer: A.The shrinking space boundary will gradually increase

context: Even if society strives to provide an equal opportunity system, people will still form an income gap in the initial distribution.Since capital in the market economy also needs to be paid, people who own capital can also get paid by owning capital.This is even greater.The income gap in the initial distribution.Therefore, after the market economy system is adopted, in order to reduce the income distribution gap, the gap formed in the primary distribution must be reduced through the redistribution process led by the state; otherwise, the income distribution gap will be reduced.Large, the formation of excessive differentiation and conflict of social classes, leading to the contradiction of public surplus.
Answer: A.The income balance is difficult to achieve

context: The survey shows that journalists' careers are closely related to the Internet.However, it only accounts for 1.8% of the number of Internet users.Compared with a large number of young students and Internet users (19.3% of the total), teachers and leading cadres of party, government, enterprise and public institutions have fewer Internet access TV drama accounts for 5% and 3.4% of the total number of Internet users); compared with those who earn less than 500 yuan and between 500 and 1,000 yuan per month (21% and 29% of the total number of Internet users, respectively), the proportion of people with higher incomes accessing the Internet There has been no significant increase; only 5.8% of the total number of people engaged in business activities go online.
Answer: A.Occupation is not directly related to Internet access

context: Electric products are susceptible to damage from sudden power failures.Power failures may be brief, only one-tenth of a second, but they may be destructive to electronic products.To prevent this from happening, uninterruptible power supplies are widely used in Computer systems, communication systems, and other electronic equipment.Uninterruptible power supplies convert AC power to DC power, and then charge the battery.In this way, the battery can make up for the intermittent power outage during a power outage.
Answer: A.Damage to electricity caused by power failure

context: The competitiveness of a city depends, in essence, not only on the quality of the hard environment-the level of infrastructure, the strength of the economic strength, the strength of the industrial structure, the friendliness of the natural environment, etc., but also the soft environment.This soft environment is composed of many human elements such as social order, public morals, cultural atmosphere, education standards, spiritual civilization, etc., and all of this depends mainly on the overall quality of the citizens.
Answer: A.Humanistic elements constitute the soft environment of urban competitiveness

context: Many heads of state did not have rich diplomatic experience before taking office, but this did not prevent them from making successful diplomatic decisions.As long as you have a high degree of political sensitivity, accurate information analysis ability and decisive courage, Can quickly learn how to make successful diplomatic decisions.For a foreign policymaker lacking all three qualities, the rich diplomatic experience is of little value.
Answer: A.Diplomatic experience does not help make the right diplomacy

context: Collective behaviors manifested in an institutional arrangement and policy-oriented way.It is just a comprehensive expression of many individual wishes and individual choices.Unless each of us cares about the environment and takes specific actions, no government will have the motivation ( Or pressure) to promote environmental protection policies.Even if the government has formulated perfect environmental protection laws and regulations, but if every citizen does not actively comply, no matter how good the environmental protection laws and regulations are, they will not achieve the expected results.
Answer: A.The government has a responsibility to raise environmental awareness among the entire population

context: Scientists have discovered that the hippocampus inside the gray matter of the brain can function as a memory storage box, but the resolution of this storage area city is not strong, and the stimulation of the same brain area city can cause it to produce real and false memories.Memory is separated from false memory, and researchers have proposed a method to strengthen memory through background recall.If something has not really happened, it is difficult to strengthen the human brain's memory of it through this method.
Answer: A.Relationship between real memory and vacation memory

context: The desert in China does provide scientists in the world with the most similar laboratory to the Martian environment.Scientists have been to the coldest Antarctica on Earth and the driest Chilean Atacama Desert, but what they really need is an extreme environment that combines the two.
Answer: A.Chinese deserts provide an ideal place for alien research

context: Wetlands refer to the transition zone between land and water bodies.Together with forests and oceans, they are called the three major ecosystems of the earth.They play an important role in maintaining biodiversity, regulating climate, and resisting floods.The flood finally made people realize that wetlands (especially the many lakes and swamps connected to the Yangtze River) can buffer the flood.However, many lakes were artificially isolated because of the need for farming around the lake, leaving only A rarely opened sluice communicated with the Yangtze River, so these naturally formed water nets were cut off, and they were powerless in the face of floods.
Answer: A.Farming around lakes is a wrong move that does more harm than good

context: As an ancient country with a history of 5,000 years of uninterrupted civilization, China has a wealth of intangible cultural heritage.These living cultures not only constitute the profound cultural heritage of the Chinese nation, but also carry the genes of the cultural origin of the Chinese nation.With the acceleration of China's modernization, cultural standardization, and changes in environmental conditions, there are still countless cultural heritages that are endangered.They are like shadows that may die out at any time.
Answer: A.New thinking on cultural heritage protection

context: High energy prices are not all bad because price levers will automatically regulate the flow of oil and ensure that mankind can find better new energy with the remaining oil, instead of using it all to cool the summer that did not exist decades ago.In terms of energy demand, in fact, if we follow price leverage without even educating consumers, everyone will make rational choices.Where the price leverage does not work, most of the problems are with the mechanism itself.Make price leverage more efficient.
Answer: A.Reforming the system is a prerequisite for giving full play to price leverage

context: The commercial design may be increasingly given the value of artistic creation and appreciation, but its fundamental starting point and endpoint is always to show the characteristics of the product to customers in an artistic way.If a commercial design cannot reminiscent of the product and Even if it is exquisite and creative, it cannot be considered a successful design.After all, the most important thing about advertising outside of creativity is its relevance.We do nt want to be attracted by a beautiful work, but the result is There is no connection between it and the endorsed goods.
Answer: A.Unique ideas are not an absolute element of commercial design

context: The status quo of China's consumer credit market makes Western banks that have invested heavily in the Chinese banking industry still invest in credit card business and are not profitable.However, foreign banks have not lost confidence in the Chinese credit card market.Although Chinese consumers have not overdrawn Consumption habits, and the other side of this "coin" is that the personal debt ratio of Chinese residents is very low.The personal consumer credit market in mainland China has just begun to develop, which is extremely attractive to foreign banks.
Answer: A.China's banking industry

context: Goethe commented that Pagnini "shows a fire-like soul on the strings".The Parisian was intoxicated by his vocals and forgot cholera that was popular at the time.In Vienna, a blind man heard his vocals and thought it was the band was playing.When they learned that this was just the sound of an Italian named Pagnini playing the violin, the blind yelled, "This is a devil!"
Answer: A.Passion like fire

context: Fei Xiaotong proposed "cultural consciousness" when reflecting on academic research in his life.He said: "People who live in a certain culture have 'self-knowledge' about their culture, understand its origin, the process of its formation, and its characteristics and its development trend, self-knowledge is to strengthen the autonomy of cultural transformation and to obtain the autonomy of deciding to adapt to the new environment and cultural choice in the new era."
Answer: A.Make the direction of cultural development more controllable

context: A young man sent many resumes to a number of advertising companies to apply for, and one of them wrote a letter to him: "Although you think you have a good essay, from your letter we found many grammatical errors, and even There are some typos."The young man thought that if this was true, I should thank them for telling me and correcting it.So he wrote a thank you letter to this company.A few days later, he received a letter from this company again Notify him of being hired.
Answer: A.Opportunities are often obtained accidentally

context: Climate warming will make the middle latitudes dry due to strong evaporation.Now agriculturally developed areas will degenerate into grasslands, high latitudes will increase precipitation, and temperate crops will be able to settle here.But globally, climate The negative effects of warming on the world economy are major, and the benefits are only localized.
Answer: A.Will reduce total global precipitation

context: There is a sentence on the wall of the National Institute of Meteorology in Washington: "When we do it right, no one will remember; when we do it wrong, no one will forget."
Answer: A.Hope people understand the difficulties and difficulties of meteorological work

context: Although about 99.5% of the evolutionary history of chimpanzees and humans are common, most thinkers see chimpanzees as monsters that have nothing to do with humans, and see themselves as the masters of all things.Not so.There is no objective basis for believing that one species is nobler than another.Whether it is chimpanzees and humans, or lizards and fungi, they have evolved through a process called natural selection that lasts 3 billion years.
Answer: A.Most thinkers do not understand the ideas of evolution

context: I picked up the book "The Urchin at the Crossroads" several times, and put it down again, because from time to time there are pictures that interrupt my thinking, which are pictures of each of the urchins that I encountered during my 18-year teaching career.The thing that other students freeze in my memory is "pictures"-images, but they are "videos"-stories.The teacher's "memory" they occupy is much larger than other children.
Answer: A.A long teaching career left a lot of memories for "I"

context: Automobiles are a commodity that has a greater impact on the environment.It seems natural that automobile manufacturers support environmental protection causes and carry out environmental protection propaganda.Environmental protection should be a factor that must be carefully considered in the development of automobile companies, but it is required that automobile companies have no profits or even losses.Environmental protection is obviously unrealistic, and it will not last.Auto companies are adopting new technological measures while minimizing environmental pollution and meeting the general trend of social development.
Answer: A.There is a contradiction between environmental protection and the realization of corporate profits

context: Prior to the 1960s, countries around the world generally paid attention to flood control engineering measures, that is, to control floods by constructing dams, reservoirs and other water conservancy facilities.However, after the 1960s, countries around the world paid more and more attention to the use of non-engineering measures in flood control planning.That is, through flood warning, disaster assessment, flood insurance, and other means, combined with various engineering measures, so as to minimize the impact of floods on human economic, environmental and social development.
Answer: A.Transfer of flood prevention concepts across the world

context: The spread of material culture and technological culture is not limited to the physical and technological fields.They may also affect people s spiritual world and lifestyle.They may even have unexpected effects.Because of these material products and technological inventions, they also It embodies the spiritual ideas, aesthetic tastes and value pursuits of creators and inventors, and reflect the contamination and education of cultural traditions they accept as members of a cultural community.The output of material culture and technical culture indirectly conveys this The spiritual content and cultural connotation contained in this material product, so that it becomes the representative of the cultural whole and spreads and affects it.
Answer: A.The cultural connotation of material products comes from cultural traditions

context: With the increasing aging of society, there are more and more empty nest elderly people in many communities.They cannot take care of themselves and need special social care.At present, the society's care for some elderly people who live alone is still lacking.It is a festival every year, although the relevant departments Visiting home to provide food and oil, clothing, money, etc., for the empty nest elderly, care is not in place, and measures are not enough.In this case, some traditional nursing homes, nursing homes, community mutual aid associations, etc.are more suitable for empty The place where the old people of Chao spend their old age can not only meet the living needs of the elderly, but also relieve the worries of their children.At the same time, it also strengthens the communication and mutual assistance between the community people, making more and more elderly people live a rich and colorful life in their old age.
Answer: A.The emergence of empty nests is not solely due to aging

context: In essence, the process of human civilization is a process of constantly leaving the animal world, which mainly includes two aspects of the evolution of human physique and the evolution of mind.From the evolution of ape to human physique, humans have spent millions of years.Time is only complete, and the evolution of the human mind is slower.When humans crossed the Stone Age and the Bronze Age entered the Iron Age, animalism still stubbornly flashed on humans.How to manage human emotions and make them animalistic It is the most important subject of Confucianism to become a rational person.If the answer to Confucianism comes down to one word, it is "li."
Answer: A.Describe the general process of the development and evolution of human civilization

context: With the advancement of communication technology, in today's society, the public opinion environment of the government has undergone significant changes.Various public opinion can use modern communication tools such as the Internet and SMS to quickly pass through time and space, increasing the space for opinions and increasing their strength.The increased transparency of decision-making and the increased awareness of citizens' democratic participation have increased the pressure on the government's public opinion.Against this background, the government's handling of the "public opinion crisis" needs to be changed from the past passive approach to the emerging situation in a timely manner Take a new approach.
Answer: A.Explain the need for the government to change its response in the new public opinion environment

context: UNESCO has designated 2008 as the "Year of the Potato".The potato, commonly known as "Potato", has been called a "hidden treasure" by experts of the United Nations.The United Nations has named a year for a crop and it has only appeared once in history.It is 2003-the International Year of Rice.Why are the protagonists of this year not "corn", "apple", but the potato, which is buried in the ground, a humble little thing? Because potatoes are needed to solve global food security problems.
Answer: A.Potatoes and rice are important crops

context: The ancients wrote poems "two sentences in three years, one yin and two tears"; writing novels.At every turn, "close the door and thank the guests, read ten years".Now many writers write several chapters each year, hundreds of thousands of words, and write months as There is no accumulation of life, no careful consideration of life, no careful layout of writing, no careful consideration of the words of the text, and repeated revisions.How can there be quality products? How can they resist the elimination of time? If "creation" is different Other work lies in the word "creation"; if it is difficult, it also lies in the word "creation", which is different from its predecessors and from itself.
Answer: A.Life is the source of creation

context: The rocks on the earth can be divided into igneous rocks, sedimentary rocks, and metamorphic rocks.Igneous rocks condensed by silicate slurry constitute the main body of the crust, which is the most calculated by volume and weight.But the most common on the ground are sedimentary rocks.After the earlier formation of the rock was destroyed, it was deposited on the concave surface of the earth after physical or chemical action.After compaction, the cement hardened again.It formed a rock with layered structural characteristics.In the crust, it is much higher than the surface.Under the influence of temperature and pressure, the structure, structure or chemical composition of rocks changes, forming metamorphic rocks different from igneous rocks and sedimentary rocks.
Answer: A.Formation conditions

context: Real historical facts and the basis of historical materials are the basic elements of historical narrative.The task of history is not only to examine historical facts, but also to completely restore the features of historical figures, historical events, and historical processes.For this, historical researchers need All kinds of historical facts are connected and combined, and scholars who advocate postmodernist historical theory believe that historical researchers can make different connections and combinations of historical facts without violating disciplinary norms.These different connections and The combination will form the historical face of different characters, events or processes.
Answer: A.Not the same as fact

context: Cultural heritage values are relatively stable and persistent.But they also change with changes in a social environment, personal outlook on life, and world outlook.Due to social status, cultural differences, interest relationships, etc., people's cultural heritage values are different in different ways.The time, place, and occasion will show great differences.The cultural heritage values of the government may depend on decision-makers.The cultural heritage values of cultural relic workers usually show relative advancedness, enthusiasm and stability.The cultural heritage values of the general public are Depends on national policies, social opinion orientation, personal cultural quality and other factors.
Answer: A.Reasons for changes in cultural values

context: 40 to 500 mg of theobromine per 100 grams of chocolate.Theobromine stimulates smooth muscle and accelerates nerve conduction.But unlike caffeine, theobromine has almost no effect on the central nervous system.Every 100 grams of chocolate contains 70 mg of caffeine.The role of caffeine is to improve alertness.It promotes people's extraordinary performance, improves observation, resists fatigue, and improves the efficiency of mental activity.Chocolate also contains amphetamine.It also has a refreshing effect and can stimulate the hypothalamus Norepinephrine secretion.
Answer: A.Chocolate has a role in promoting nerve excitement

context: Foreign banks enter emerging market countries.In order to maintain their survival, the main players in the banking industry in emerging market countries will strive for a larger market share as much as possible to fully expand their competitive advantages.Efforts will be made to provide customers with quality and cheap financial products and financial services.Service, this process will inevitably promote the improvement of the micro-efficiency of the banking industry.
Answer: A.Foreign banks' entry into emerging market countries

context: In different countries and at different times, the science and technology management system can be different and innovative, but there is one system that is particularly important and universal: that is the generalization of the subject of innovation, or the nationalization or people's nature of the daily innovation strategy.Let everyone have the heart to seek change and innovation, so that every invention, regardless of its size, has the opportunity to be displayed.It should be the basic starting point for building a large-scale independent innovation system and environment.

context: "Click here to set the homepage", this reminder was spread across various websites in 2000.Regardless of Chinese websites or English websites, they will habitually add such a line in the upper right corner.I am afraid that computer diners do not know how to set the homepage.But after 2005, this "goodwill" reminder seemed to disappear overnight.Just like a newspaper omitted its subscription hotline, big websites no longer overly enthusiastically recommended the homepage setting.
Answer: A.Reasons for the changes in the form of web pages

context: Seven years ago, Swiss biologist Beth Likus appeared on the cover of Time, and his invention of genetically modified rice is believed to improve the lives of millions of poor people in the world.But 7 years later, the market is still No trace of genetically modified rice has been seen.Europeans have always been skeptical of genetically modified foods.Supermarkets indicate that the products they sell are "non-GMO".The EU requires that any product with more than 0.9% of GM ingredients be marked on the packaging.Westerners' misplaced moral values are taking the lives of millions of poor nations.
Answer: A.Genetically modified foods are actually safe

context: Music is true Esperanto, a language of emotion.When two countries are willing to communicate through music, it may contain some kind of political goodwill, that is, the two parties want to talk in a language of music that is understandable and acceptable to each other."Communicative", music can often bring spiritual pleasure to people.Thus creating a good atmosphere for interpersonal communication.

context: To date, the development of China's agriculture has made it difficult for anyone of them to make a single breakthrough.Now the structural adjustment has attracted great attention, but other supporting reforms cannot be ignored, especially the market-oriented reform that must be accelerated to establish a unified national market.Promote the free flow of rural factors and products.If the market mechanism fails to develop as it should, the market-oriented structural adjustment will lose the most important foundation, and regional distribution and the use of comparative advantages will be impossible to talk about.
Answer: A.The market is the guide for rural structural adjustment

context: Compared with the neglect of cross-talk in the media, the raging and popular weekend cross talk club is quite intriguing.The art born and grew up among the people can only gain new vitality if it returns to the people and returns to life.If there is no such return, Face-to-face exchanges and discussions with the audience, without the practice and refinement of the stage, without the audience's understanding of the laughter and understanding, communication will not be achieved.

context: The earthquake is short-term, and the earthquake prediction is still a worldwide problem.At present, accurate prediction of the magnitude and time of the earthquake is not yet possible.Foreign seismologists generally believe that plastic rocks or serpentine in the lower crust are squeezed into cracks in the upper crust.Earthquakes will occur at these times.These easily sliding serpentine rocks are generated by the action of minerals rich in iron and magnesium with water, and hydrogen is produced in the process.Once the layer breaks, hydrogen passes through the fractures of the fault Emerging, causing a sharp increase in the hydrogen concentration in normal air.
Answer: A.Explain that earthquakes are not unpredictable

context: The baby fish is not good at hunting, but it is hidden among the rocks at the beach mouth.When it finds the prey passing, it makes a sudden attack.Its teeth are sharp and dense, and it is difficult to escape after the prey enters the mouth.Its teeth cannot be chewed, but it will only open its mouth.The food is swallowed and then digested slowly in the stomach.The baby fish has a strong ability to endure hunger, and it will not starve to death even if it does not eat for two or three years.It can also be overeating, and a full meal can increase the weight by one-fifth.1.When food is lacking, the phenomenon of similar cannibalism can occur, and even hunger with eggs.Baby fishes like fish, crabs, shrimps, frogs, snakes and other animals.
Answer: A.Temperament

context: Traditional Chinese painting pays attention to "knowing the white and keeping the black", which means "the black is the painting, the white is blank".The blank space left on the screen must be valued like the image of the painting.In other words, the blank space left must be reasonable It must conform to the composition rules.It is best to avoid the same size and shape of the blank, the blankest to be round and square, and the blank to be scattered like stars.The good blanks are large and small, all are irregular triangles, and the blanks are completely uniform.
Answer: A.Characteristics of Traditional Chinese Painting

context: You do a job just to make a living and don't like it, this job is just your profession.You do a job just because you like it and don't care if it can bring benefits, this job is your Career.Ideally, career and career are the same, do what you like and make a living from it.
Answer: A.Career and career

context: At the Olympic Games, a post said that when playing the national anthem, the Spanish team did not have an opening, so it was not patriotic.It was inferred that Jordan's dream team was the most patriotic.When they received the prize, the team members wore the United States The flag.However, the truth is that the Spanish national anthem has no lyrics at all.The U.S.national team is sponsored by Reebok and Jordan is sponsored by Nike.They swore allegiance to Nike and used the national flag to cover the Reebok logo to receive the award.
Answer: A.Biographies and facts

context: What is travel? De Botton didn't want to rush to provide analysis; what was travel for? DeBorton does not seem to be eager to study.But after releasing the paper, I believe that each reader will get an analysis-this analysis is both speculative and emotional; it is both hearty and indescribable because it is more like It is an emotion that is intoxicating and unknowing.
Answer: A.Readers will get ambiguous analysis after reading

context: Different from the director-centered creativity in the film, the center of creativity in the television industry is the screenwriter.The reason why screenwriting is important in the television industry is that the small picture frame does not give as much space for visual play, and language art is particularly important.There is also the storyline as an attraction, and the comedy show is entirely dependent on the performance of the actors and the charm of the language; they are all shot in the studio, and the shooting is purely technical, and the creativity lies in dialogue and performance.
Answer: A.Comparing the creative differences between the television and film industries

context: With the further increase of global meat production, the impact of animal husbandry on the global greenhouse effect will also increase.At present, the land for animal husbandry has accounted for 30% of the earth's land area.Take up more land for fodder and grazing.In Latin America, 70% of the forest has been cleared to make room for pastures.The livestock industry currently poses a threat to 306 of the 825 terrestrial ecological zones worldwide.And threatened 1699 endangered species.
Answer: A.Environmental costs of developing livestock

context: Although the status of gold is not as good as it used to be, the magic is still there.Paper money is powerless in the face of inflation, and gold is inherently value-preserving, especially in the era of inflation.The price of the US dollar and gold is like the two ends of a seesaw, and the dollar continues to depreciate Under the background of the market, the price of gold will naturally rise.When the stock market risks increase, the gold market will become a safe haven for funds.The recent rise in gold prices in the international market has nothing to do with the stock market shock caused by the U.S.subprime mortgage crisis.
Answer: A.Predicting the future trend of the gold market

context: Psychological correction, as a professional and scientific method of educational reform, is of significance not only to promote the reform of prisoners, but also to reduce the probability of repeated crimes after prisoners leave the prison.Of course, because the construction of the discipline of psychology in China is not yet mature, Although psychological correction has already achieved initial results in the prison management system, it will take time for large-scale use in the prison system.
Answer: A.plays an important role in prison management

context: A little girl was lying on the window sill, and the people watching the window were burying her beloved puppies.She couldn't help crying and sorrowful.When her grandfather saw this, he quickly led her to another window and let her enjoy his rose garden.Sure enough, the little girl's mood suddenly became clear.The old man held up his granddaughter's chin and said, "Child, you opened the wrong window."
Answer: A.People should understand the problem from different perspectives

context: With the strengthening of the judicial principle of "who advocates and who gives evidence", the ability to collect strong evidence has become the key to the success or failure of civil litigation.At present, although people's awareness of investigation and evidence collection has increased, evidence collection, preservation and use The capacity of civil investigation is still weak.Many parties often have to commission lawyers or other personnel to investigate and obtain evidence.Therefore, the demand for civil investigation and evidence collection is increasing.
Answer: A.The main ways to investigate and obtain evidence in civil proceedings

context: Yunnan is located at the junction of two major biodiversity hotspots in the world.The high-altitude Qinghai-Tibet Plateau quickly transitioned to the low-altitude Malay Peninsula in Yunnan.Most rivers in Yunnan are north-south, and tropical flora and fauna follow the north-west wet and hot The air has penetrated into most areas of Yunnan.Therefore, Yunnan has more than 50% of plant species, more than 70% of animal species, and more than 80% of vegetation types in 4% of the country's land area.
Answer: A.The characteristics of biodiversity in Yunnan are outstanding

context: Today, people often live outside the mountains without knowing the history of their withdrawal from the plains.During the Tang and Song dynasties, as the economic and cultural center moved from the Yellow River basin to the Yangtze River basin, a large number of people moved north to the south, and the South China tigers completely withdrew from the plains.The idioms such as "adjusting the tiger to leave the mountain", "releasing the tiger to return to the mountain", "watching the tiger while sitting on the mountain" and other idioms later showed that people had mistakenly believed that the tiger was a mountain species and did not know that the tiger was "forced to go up the mountain" because of human activities.
Answer: A.Clarify people's misunderstanding about the area where tigers live

context: Zhouzhuang's tourism income has exceeded the 100 million yuan mark for many years.In southern Jiangsu, although the ancient cultural towns comparable to Zhouzhuang are not in the minority, tourism income can only be looked at in Zhouzhuang.A local old man said that Chen Yifei painted in the 1970s After the double bridge here, the painting won an award in the United States and was heavily collected by oil tycoon Hammer.When Deng Xiaoping visited the United States in 1979, Hammer added it to him and said it was painting near Shanghai, China.Small town.Today, Zhouzhuang has become the first choice for visiting the ancient town of Jiangnan.
Answer: A.Cultural exchange is an important content of the international exchange

context: In recent years, global paper prices have continued to rise.According to analysis, the price of pulp will be higher and higher, and for environmental reasons, the global pulp production capacity is weakening.Rising oil prices will make the problem worse, and according to statistics, it is predicted that this upward trend will not be reversed in the short term.When the price of paper rises to a certain level, it will be reflected in the book price.Even if the buyer is not considered to reduce purchases due to additional expenditures, the increased occupation of funds will also make the bookstore an increased operating risk.
Answer: A.Many reasons for the price increase

context: The theory of "aestheticization of daily life" proposed by western scholars is based on the objective basis of its emergence.It emerged on the premise of the rapid development of science and technology, the gradually improving quality of material life, and the increasing transition of people from material needs to spiritual needs.This theory responds to reality.The emergence of this response is, on the one hand, the requirement of objective reality for the theory, and on the other hand, the inevitable law of the development of western philosophy, aesthetics, and literary and artistic theories.
Answer: A.Gained widespread recognition in all aspects

context: With the advancement of science and the establishment of gene therapy methods, the use of gene stimulants has become possible, but it is very difficult to detect whether athletes have used gene stimulants.Although traces can be found from proteomics tests, the detection of genes generally requires Samples of athletes' body tissues, which involves the issue of respect for athletes.In addition, the current detection technology cannot keep pace with genetic modification.In addition to listing genetic stimulants in the World Anti-Doping Agency, it is also absorbing the best in the world.Of genetic technology experts serve themselves, hoping to develop genetic stimulant detection technology and achieve relevant cutting-edge results.
Answer: A.Need to continuously improve technical means

context: Canadian scientists accidentally discovered when studying "Williams syndrome" that people with musical and mathematical talents are actually caused by a genetic disorder, and the same genetic disorder may also lead to mental illness such as schizophrenia.Most children born with Williams Syndrome are staggered by 20 genes on chromosome 7 in their bodies.This occurs in one in every 20,000 people worldwide.
Answer: A.Genetic disorder and genius

context: In the face of heavy traffic every day, we always feel that it is disorderly.Once we see the clouds, we will find that there is still group collaboration under this "chaos": every car has its goal, and every driver strives to avoid it.Traffic accidents are individual behaviors; when driving on the road, the cars are connected end to end, the car distance is narrow but does not collide, the vehicle speeds up when the distance is increased, and the vehicle speed decreases when the distance is small.If you refuse to cooperate, the road will It will become an accumulation of waste copper and iron.Interestingly, this is not mainly the result of traffic commands by the traffic police, but the unintended result of each driver after pursuing his own goals.
Answer: A.Individual behavior is the basis of group collaboration

context: Involving art museums has always been a great opportunity for architects, so they will get a stage where they can enjoy the most dazzling Chinese color techniques.At the Van Gogh Art Museum, from the original design sketch of Ritterveld to the design of the annex.Kurokawa Kiyoshi, together with Van Gore who made up for their shortcomings, has invariably adopted a very low-key and restrained attitude, and there has been no attempt to seize the title.Is it right to speculate that they are facing such a special situation? The targets of this project all know that their mission is not to defile Van Gogh with gorgeousness? Leave all the gorgeousness to the starry sky that rotates like fireworks under the paintbrush!

context: The similar empirical knowledge of ancient Greece and ancient China produced similar theoretical insights, such as the understanding of the principle of leverage by Aristotle and the Mo Jing.However, the initial mechanical theory of ancient Greece soon developed into theoretical knowledge.Complex and the Chinese Mohist mechanics tradition was interrupted after the Warring States Period.The theory of not being good at observing, recognizing the movement of objects and forming a system is an obvious "weakness" in the ancient Chinese scientific tradition.In contrast, the Chinese achievements in solving practical problems are more prominent.

context: Population density is the number of people living in a unit of land, and it is an indicator of the density of population around the world.However, population density only reflects the general quantitative relationship between population and land area, and cannot reflect the composition of the population on a unit of land.It reflects the relationship between the population and the land area that actually feeds him.In order to make up for these shortcomings, some new complementary density indicators have appeared, such as physiological density, agricultural density, etc., and the population density calculated by area is called the mathematical density of the population.
Answer: A.Reasons for the evolution of the meaning of population density

context: Can color blindness be an astronomer? In fact, most of the photos analyzed by astronomers in daily life are black and white.The colorful astronomical photos we see in magazines and other color prints are actually synthesized by processing black and white photos of different bands taken by multiple telescopes.And these bands are not necessarily in the range of human visible light, so even for people with normal vision, these pictures are not the true colors of celestial bodies.
Answer: A.Astronomers need to identify the color of visible light

context: When many multinational companies enter the Chinese market, they are trying to implement localized communication strategies and marketing solutions, and they are expecting the attention and recognition of Chinese consumers.The use of "Chinese elements" in advertising is a manifestation.This is worthy of recognition.However, this use must be consistent with people's cultural habits and emotional tendencies.If it is simply imitated and used technically, and lacks true cultural respect and understanding, no matter how beautiful the "elements" will only open up "evil" Flower ".

context: Every year, the British Banking Association organizes a training course to help bank staff identify counterfeit banknotes.During the training, trainees can't even touch a counterfeit banknote.They use real banknotes during training and speak real banknotes in class.Characteristics.Experts explained that students repeatedly get used to the feeling of real banknotes by repeatedly touching real banknotes, fingers, and eyes, and they will feel particularly unaccustomed when they encounter counterfeit banknotes in the future.Although they are characteristic of counterfeit banknotes Knowing nothing, subconsciously told them: "This is not real money!" According to statistics, staff who have received such training have a much better ability to recognize counterfeit money.

context: The reasons that affect climate change in a region for a long time or for a certain period of time are numerous and complex, and people have not yet been able to say exactly how much various factors affect climate change.Natural factors are still the dominant factors influencing the climate.Human activities are still not enough to affect the basic attributes of regional climates, and even less than the 51 major glacial or interglacial climatic changes.

context: If you find a good product or a large market, you should follow up immediately; find the defects of the existing products in the follow-up, and then make up for the defects through innovation, surpass the opponent, and achieve the latecomer.Of course, the goal of innovation is to create, Rather than simply imitating.Therefore, creative imitators need to understand other people's creativity, recombine, and improve to produce new things with different functions and values.In fact, all products except the first generation are original and future Progress is achieved through creative imitation.

context: More and more people have become blind followers of the Internet.They are afraid that their customary virtual identity will be preempted by someone in an online community.This scene seems to be similar to the free email mailbox boom around 1999.Statistics at that time shows that each Internet user has registered an average of 8.6 e-mail boxes.By 2005, only 18% of these mailboxes were still in use, and the average e-mail box used by each natural Internet person was only 1.73.Similarly, only a few community registrants will Become a surviving network natural person.Everyone's limited energy and time determine the ceiling height of the future online community.

context: A city is like a huge sponge.The labor force is like flowing water between urban and rural areas.When the economy is in an upward period, economic expansion will absorb more labor: When the economy is in a downward period, the economic recession will squeeze these labor forces back into the countryside.The sponge effect caused by China's urban-rural dual structure played a role as an employment buffer in the financial crisis.However, this sponge effect is unsustainable because one of China's basic national conditions is that agricultural surplus labor must be transferred to cities.Transfer.

context: Chinese consumers' understanding and requirements for cars have changed greatly, and their values and changes in the understanding of cars will influence their car purchase intentions.In the survey of multiple car purchase indicators, we found that we no longer emphasize A single indicator, but safety performance is still the most concerned indicator for consumers when buying a car, and the degree of attention in our survey is 8.6%; the second focus is on the handling performance of the car; the third is quality and durability; then the appearance and styling, Comfort level, brand reputation, image, power performance and second-hand car value, etc.Even the indicators behind the brand share reached 8.1%.

context: Without lightning, mankind would lose a hard-working "cleaner".When lightning strikes, part of the oxygen in the atmosphere is excited into ozone, and the thin ozone is not only odorless, but also absorbs most of the cosmic rays, making the surface of the earth Organisms are not harmed by excessive ultraviolet radiation.The high temperature generated during the lightning process can also kill more than 90% of bacteria and microorganisms in the atmosphere, making the air more pure and fresh and pleasant.
Answer: A.Lightning formation mechanism

context: Wittgenstein is a student of the famous philosopher Moore at Cambridge University.One day, the philosopher Russell asked Moore: "Who is your best student?" context: There was a child who, when he was in high school, his parents chose the literary path for him.It took him only one semester.The teacher wrote the conclusion in his comment: "The student should study hard, but be too polite and rigid.Even if such a person has perfect morals, he must never make achievements in literature."Later, after thinking that the chemistry teacher understood this characteristic of him, he suggested that he change to chemistry, because what is needed for chemistry experiments is meticulous.After studying chemistry, he seemed to have found his own stage in life, and his grades were far ahead of his classmates.Later, he won the Nobel Prize in Chemistry, his name was Otto Wallach.

context: According to preliminary statistics, China has found nearly 470,000 immovable cultural relics and about 2,900 museums.A rough estimate is that the national cultural relics collection does not exceed 20 million.What are these numbers? context: Fujian and Zhejiang have the most tidal resources in China's sea areas, and this tide contains this huge energy.Tidal power is the use of favorable terrains such as bays and estuaries to build water banks and form reservoirs so that they can be accumulated in large quantities or in dams.A hydroelectric power plant is built next to it to generate electricity through hydro-generators.However, tidal power has higher requirements for natural conditions.may.

context: Communication and solitude were originally two ways of living in the world.For each person, these two methods are essential, but the proportions are not the same.Due to the differences in personality, some people prefer to communicate.Some people prefer to be alone.People often think of communication as a capability, but they ignore that solitude is also a capability, and in a sense, it is a more important capability than communication.On the other hand, not understanding communication is of course It is a pity that impatience with loneliness is not a serious defect.

context: In translation, "literal translation" focuses on the faithfulness of the original text, and "parallel translation" focuses on the smoothness of the translation tone.Which translation method is the best, people have their own opinions.In my opinion, there should be no faithfulness between the literal translation and the free translation Translation must be able to express the meaning of the original text as much as possible.Thoughts and feelings are consistent with the language, which changes with each other.There is only one precise statement for one meaning, and the meaning is completely different.So if you want to express the original meaning as much as possible, you must try to keep the original sentence structured.Therefore, a literal translation must not be a free translation, and free translation cannot be a free translation.
Answer: A.The translation method should be flexible according to the original meaning

context: It is now recognized that, on the one hand, the aurora is related to the large-scale interaction of the Earth's upper atmosphere and the geomagnetic field, and on the other hand, it is related to the high-speed charged particle stream emitted by the sun, which is often called the solar wind.The essential conditions for the formation of the aurora are the atmosphere, magnetic field and solar wind.All other planets in the solar system with these three conditions, such as Jupiter and Mercury, will also produce aurora around them.This has been actually observed.Proven.
Answer: A.The role of the sun in the formation of aurora

context: Genetics has important guiding significance for studying the origin of life on earth, medicine, agricultural animal and plant and microbial breeding, as well as anthropology and sociology.It was developed on the basis of animal and plant breeding, and it is bound to be able to Come back to know the practice of animal and plant breeding.The rise of the antibiotic industry has promoted the development of microbial genetics, and the development of microbial genetics has also promoted the progress of the antibiotic industry and other fermentation industries.

context: Scientists in France and Belgium are trying to find out whether the mathematical genius is different from the brain of ordinary people.In a published report, they said that the study found that someone can mentally solve complex mathematical problems quickly, probably because they can use brain parts that others cannot use.Researchers used positron ray scanning technology to compare the brain of a famous mathematician with the brain of ordinary people.They found that when mathematicians perform problem calculations, the part of the brain usually responsible for long-term memory also becomes active, and Most people do not have this phenomenon.Therefore, researchers have concluded that mathematicians use more memory when performing calculations, which speeds up calculations.This principle is the same as the principle of computers.The larger the memory, the faster the calculation speed.
Answer: A.The more you use your brain, the faster your calculations will be.

context: Tropical forests showing the diversity of nature are the last habitats of many animals, and their existence is extremely important to humans.Faced with the severe destruction of tropical forests, it is easy to forget that most of the forests in temperate regions have already encountered Passed: In developed areas, a large number of virgin forests have disappeared; in development areas, especially in areas of severe rainfall, once the plants on those hillsides are washed out, it will cause problems such as floods and soil collapse.It can withstand local felling and survive, but some species have a narrow distribution range.Excessive felling will make it disappear forever.
Answer: A.Call for attention and strengthening of the protection of temperate forests

context: Some people say that all knowledge is scientific, and all science is colorless, and when we are pursuing knowledge, we must know that there is no color attitude.If this statement is not expanded at will, I also agree.But we must know that as long as To be a living person, there must be color.The pursuit of colorless knowledge must lurk with a power of color behind it or at the bottom.This driving force not only determines the direction of a person's pursuit of knowledge and The outcome also determines whether a person is sincere to knowledge.

context: Most of the ancient Chinese scientific works are empirical summaries, not theoretical discussions.The inventions described are designed to solve practical problems in national and social life, rather than trying to achieve major breakthroughs in a certain research field.In terms of research methods, Chinese science and technology attaches importance to comprehensive and holistic research, rather than grasping things as a whole, rather than separating research objects from the intricate connections, independently studying their entities and attributes, and exploring their mysteries in detail.Science and technology in ancient China did not develop to a higher level.

context: Traditional animal resource protection measures are mainly delineating protected areas or establishing conservation bases.These measures can well protect species diversity, but there are also some shortcomings: the area of the protected area is large, and poaching is repeatedly banned; establishment of good breeding bases for protection Local breeds have large investment and long time, and are prone to inbreeding, species decline and other phenomena.The advent of new achievements in biotechnology, such as test tubes, cloning, and cryopreservation, has opened up new ways for the protection and utilization of animal genetic resources."Ark" is no longer heaven and earth.

context: Today, with the rapid development of science and technology, people's material, spiritual and cultural needs are increasing day by day.Small-scale, low-level science popularization activities have not adapted to the development of the times."Understanding science", a large "science popularization", has become an urgent need for all Major issues of social concern.With the in-depth development of science and technology, science and technology have gradually formed their own concepts and logical systems, and they have gradually disappeared from the public's sight and common sense.It is difficult for people to accurately understand the knowledge structure and experience of the past.It is difficult to judge the social value and significance of science and its various changes, which has made some science and technology become knowledge barriers that lie on the road of human development.

context: Once a small advertising lightbox can kill about 350,000 insects a year.Bright nights can seriously affect the life cycle of insects, especially adults.Insects are an important part of the food chain in nature.Many small animals, birds and bats Insects are the main food, and many plants rely on insects for pollination.If the types and numbers of insects change, the ecological environment will be seriously affected.The pressure of excessive lighting on energy waste and environmental pollution is self-evident.
Answer: A.Main effects of light on plant and animal growth

context: Some people say that the rules of the economic field and the moral field are different.The economic field emphasizes the role of "economic man" and the principle of doing more and more profit; while the moral field requires dedication, altruism, mutual assistance, etc.It is true that there are rules of supply and demand signals, equivalent exchange, clear property rights, and profit maximization in the economic field, but since it is a social activity of people, moral principles will also penetrate into it every moment, and it is difficult to clearly separate the two.

context: Compared with hard power, soft power is more of an influence, a kind of spirituality.The soft power of a city is the outside world s appeal to the city, its intuitive response and imprint of the mind.Identity and attachment are the reflections of the wisdom and feelings of city managers.The combination of soft power and hard power constitutes the overall strength of a city, and the addition of the two is not constant.Soft power directly affects the performance of hard power.Strength is like a rope, and hard strength is like a pile of hard dry wood.Although the rope is soft, it can tightly bind the hard dry wood to form huge energy that can forge a beautiful city.

context: Since the reform and opening-up, China's economy has maintained a high-speed growth trend overall, but the growth of labor employment has been much lower than the rate of economic growth.At present, although the proportion of China's service industry absorbing labor employment has been rising, it has even become an employment The main force, and basically digested all the newly added labor force, including the labor force stock transferred from agriculture and manufacturing, but compared to developed countries, its contribution to labor employment is still too low.We must use the industrial structure Opportunities for adjustments and changes in growth models to tap the huge potential of the service industry for economic development and employment expansion.
Answer: A.Industrial structure adjustment is an important opportunity for the rapid development of China's service industry

context: The taboo is to show the awe of the feudal monarchs and lords, and we must avoid saying their names directly and express them in other ways, it is the product of the feudal patriarchal system and the embodiment of the family and the respect of the ancestors.In the Western Zhou Dynasty, complete in the Qin and Han dynasties, prevailed in the Tang and Song dynasties, and reached the extreme during the Qianlong Reign in the Yongzheng period of the Qing Dynasty.Taboos, as peculiar to the feudal society, are now extinct.The taboo has evolved into some custom of avoiding evil, and its impact in real life still exists.
Answer: A.The development of feudal society makes taboos more and more strict

context: In Ankole, the Hima people who live on livestock and the Iru people who live on agriculture live together; in Arizona, the Navajo people used to hunt and gather for their livelihoods, but now they mainly live on livestock.The Hoppies are neighbors; the former southeastern coast of Australia was home to indigenous people who hunted and looted food, but now they live in Europe engaged in agriculture, animal husbandry and industry.

context: Philosophy used to be a way of life.The so-called Socratic philosophy is not just a way to talk to others, and the various theories he put forward in the dialogue.Philosophy was not a written study from the beginning, but a way of living.But we have forgotten this later and turned it into a difficult game far from every day.Even the rigid Kant in the eyes of many people, Don't forget to distinguish between "philosophy of college significance" and "philosophy of WTO significance", and the latter is respected.

context: Processing technology is considered to be the core technology of traditional Chinese medicine and it is also a traditional skill unique to traditional Chinese medicine.Mastering it is equivalent to mastering the traditional Chinese medicine market.Foreign companies usually hire domestic processing experts to "steal" processing technology by opening film processing plants in China.At present, there are dozens of such foreign-funded enterprises.This is because some local governments do not understand the state's regulations in special fields and cannot manage them; while some local governments know these regulations, but for economic indicators, they do not care about this.Regardless, surveys show that the number of actual domestic manufacturers of decoction pieces is several hundred more than that announced by the State Drug Administration.

context: The World Memory Project is a continuation of the World Heritage Project.The World Heritage Project was initiated by UNESCO in 1972, 20 years earlier than the World Memory Project, and it focuses on cultural and cultural values of outstanding significance and universal value in natural and artificial environments.Natural heritage, such as buildings or sites with historical, aesthetic, archeological, scientific, and anthropological research value, while World Memory Engineering focuses on documentary heritage, specifically precious documents in any medium maintained by manuscripts, libraries and archives And oral history.
Answer: A.Culture and Archives

context: The area of floating ice in the Arctic waters has gradually decreased, reducing the total by about 20%, making it difficult for polar bears to stand on the ice for a long time.In addition, some countries have hunted seals in large numbers.It is difficult to hunt seals on ice floes.When we arrived at a bay near 80 degrees north latitude on the northwest coast of the island of Spitzbergen in the Arctic, we were surprised to shoot the entire process of polar bear fishing.The habit of living and "no water" began to jump out of the icy seawater to catch fish for food.

context: One professor divided the students into several groups, sent each group some jigsaw pieces, and timed to see which group could be completed first.In fact, the numbers are marked on the back of each puzzle in order, and only need to be stitched in the order of these numbers You can spell the whole picture very quickly, but very few groups notice this.Some spells a long time before they find the digital mark on the back, and some never see it at all.

context: The survey shows that the sales volume of children's books in 2007 increased by nearly 25% year-on-year, becoming another high-growth module after economic management, academic and cultural books.In the national book retail market in 2007, children's books accounted for 11% Above; the sales of local original children's literary works are even more explosive, and they often occupy at least half of the seats on the best-selling list of children's books in major bookstores.

context: When talking about French literature in the minds of the Chinese, the French can't help but say in a contemptuous tone: "You like La Traviata." In the eyes of the French, he likes Dumas and has some taste.After all, he has an "Earl Monte Cristo", there are "Three Musketeers", what does Xiao Zhongma have? I just wrote a social flower.French literature is the pride of the French people and plays a pivotal role in world literature.Just like "La Traviata" is obviously a disrespect for French literature."La Traviata" has become a kind of It is popular, almost a hundred years ago.At that time, it was failing to catch up with the Reform Movement of 1898, people were frustrated, and the way of improvement was not feasible.Everyone had to read a random novel.The birth of "La Traviata" in China was born actually.

context: The fine volcanic ash contains silicon dioxide, and the melting point of this compound is 1100 degrees Celsius.At present, the operating temperature of the turbine engine of most aircraft is 1400 degrees Celsius.Once the volcanic ash is sucked into the interior of the engine, the silica will be adsorbed on the turbine after melting.The blades and turbines guided the blades, leading to catastrophic consequences.In 1982, two aircraft passed through the volcanic ash erupting from the Kalungong volcano in West Java, Indonesia.All eight engines of the two aircraft were stopped, ranging from 11,000 meters.After a high altitude glide to 400 meters, it restarted to make an emergency landing.
Answer: A.Volcanic ash has a serious impact on aircraft flight

context: From parchment, bamboo tube to paper, the invention of movable type printing, from Morse code, binary code to the digitization of images, the carriers of cultural products are becoming lighter, and the spread of spiritual products is becoming faster and faster.Especially the Internet Inventions and applications just broke the time and space boundaries of cultural content transmission, allowing text, video, and music to be transmitted to any corner of the earth in an instant.At the same time, with the help of new tools of technological innovation, people can more quickly Speed, producing exciting anime games, digital film, and television, mobile newspapers, online publishing, audiobooks, etc., and creating new cultural industries.
Answer: A.Cultural progress includes technological development and innovation

context: After the First World War, not only the natural sciences, but also the entire German academic culture showed a booming scene.Heidegger's position in the history of philosophy need not be repeated.Marx and Weber made the whole history of social science famous.Schmidt was the ultimate influence on modern constitutional government.In terms of psychology, the Gestalt School has also quietly risen.In literature, Hoptman and Thomasman, two Nobel winners, have twin stars.Remark's "No War on the Western Front" is the most famous in the last century.One of his works; drama, film and music also quickly entered the golden age, and the style became charming and diversified.Germany seems to want to lose what it lost politically and economically, and win back scientifically and culturally.For a regime that has changed cabinets many times in 14 years, such prosperity can be considered a small miracle.
Answer: A.Germany leads the world in academic culture after World War I

context: The Internet age is an era of "excessive information and scarce attention".The essence of the contemporary economy based on the Internet is the "attention economy".In this economic form, the most important resource is attention.Attracting attention has become a very important issue.The emphasis on the economic value of attention in the Internet age is undoubtedly necessary, but if the moral evaluation and spiritual significance of attention are ignored, it will lead to a lack of humanity due to attention.Caring and minimal respect, so that someone will use the convenience and concealment of the network means to waste, pollute, and trample on others' attention through false and bad information, which is undoubtedly a serious mental injury.
Answer: A.Call on the Internet to make good use of attention and cherish its spiritual and cultural value

context: The first electric car was on the road as early as 1990.Although some well-known car manufacturers have launched their own pure electric concept cars in recent years, this has not shortened the distance between electric cars and real life.The reason is the research and development of electric vehicles is not just as simple as replacing the traditional engine with an electric motor, but a huge research topic.There are many problems such as battery capacity, storage capacity, stability, etc.for automotive batteries alone.In addition, replacing traditional engines with electric motors Later, body design, traditional systems, and electrical systems will have disruptive changes.To solve this series of problems, automobile manufacturers need to have strong R & D capabilities.(Center sentence)
Answer: A.The bottleneck of electric vehicle research and development is the problem of batteries

context: The U.S.Department of Agriculture database contains various vitamin contents of common foods.Some people have calculated the data of various foods in the state of "raw" and "cooked".After removing the effect of changes in water content, we have obtained the vitamins after heating.Loss ratio.Although these data are not necessarily very accurate, they are enough to get a meaningful impression: Vitamins A.and E are not affected by temperature.The loss of food after processing into cooked food is about 10%, and the loss of vitamin C.is 16 %, While vitamin B.is the most unstable, with a loss of 26%.Other vitamins are also basically in this range.In general, after heating food to mature food, the loss of vitamins is roughly 10% to 25%.between.
Answer: A.There is no difference in vitamin content between raw and cooked food

context: Although "negative news" focuses on negative themes that reflect conflict, confrontation, and disharmony, the reporter's use of the subject matter may be expressed in different ways.Good reporters often find positive factors in negative themes, even If you can't find positive factors, you will also deal with negative factors in a constructive manner, alerting and reflecting; while lame reporters face certain negative themes, they will report with a mind-hunting attitude, making people wonder about the senses.Among the stimuli, it is difficult to obtain spiritual shock, baptism, and reflection.On the contrary, it will expand people's sense of fear and insecurity to society and cause extremely bad effects.
Answer: A.Even negative topics contain positive factors that can be tapped

context: History has proven that each round of economic crisis is accompanied by a deep technological revolution and then gradually comes out of the trough and begins to recover.It has to be acknowledged that the financial crisis has caused an unprecedented crisis in "Made in China".The direct result of this is that all regions are catching up.Industrial upgrading, but at the same time new problems have arisen.Under the habit of "grasping the big and letting the small," many people think that industrial upgrading is a matter for large enterprises and has little to do with SMEs.Obviously, this is a misunderstanding.The core driving force for industrial upgrading is technological innovation, and SMEs are the most active force in technological innovation.
Answer: A.New Issues Facing Chinese Enterprises in the Process of Industrial Upgrade

context: Canadian researchers surveyed 308 volunteers (198 of whom were women) with an average age of 29 in different parts of North America, and found that 50.7% of people had Internet delays and 47% of their time was not used for work, and It is used to delay work.Research shows that the delay of white-collar workers is more serious than that of blue-collar workers.White-collar workers who are hired are more serious than white-collar workers who operate freely.In the case of employment, subordinates have more serious delays than their superiors.Or it is easier to divert attention and procrastinate, while pleasant work has more direct returns and greater opportunities, which will make people motivated to complete faster.
Answer: A.Less physical effort

context: An in-depth study of Western classics does not make people better or worse, nor does it make citizens more useful or harmful.The self-conversation of the soul is not a social reality in nature.The whole significance of Western classics is to make people use themselves.Loneliness.
Answer: A.Studying Western classics can dispatch loneliness

context: "I don't agree with you, but I swear to defend your right to speak", this sentence gathered together is said by French enlightenment thinker, Voltaire known as "French conscience", as an icon of defending "free speech" This sentence has been consistently promoted by European and American media and politicians to the world.What is unexpected is that after research, Voltaire did not say this sentence, which seems to be in the West s "free speech" statement.Poke a hole.A Chinese scholar who has lived in Europe and America for many years said that there are 18 types of "freedom of speech" in the United States that are not protected, and the content of the "European Convention on Human Rights" restricting free speech is twice as long as the content of free speech.
Answer: A.There are double standards for "free speech" in the West

context: Many of the shortcomings of literary criticism are the lack of theoretical courage.The reason why criticism is aphasia and absent is that there is no new and powerful theory and spirit that can be applied to support it, and there is nothing to say in my heart.What is healthy? Literary criticism? There are many standards.One of the most important standards is the ability to tolerate and rationally treat cultural practices that are different from their own cultural claims.
Answer: A.Tolerance and rationality are the most important theoretical criteria in literary criticism

context: The Central Meteorological Observatory performs weather forecast, first solves the equations describing the evolution of the weather with a computer, and "calculates" the future weather.The weather forecaster analyzes the weather map, meteorological satellite and other data, and then makes the next 3-5 days based on the accumulated experience Every day at 8 am, the Central Meteorological Observatory connects to various meteorological stations to conduct weather consultations.The chief forecaster summarizes everyone's forecast opinions and makes prediction conclusions on the development and change of future weather.
Answer: A.How is China's "future weather" forecast made?

context: Parents, students, and employers do not have the natural power to participate in the management of institutions, but they have the right to account for the social responsibility of higher education institutions.The popularization of higher education, diversified sources of university funding.As a result, parents, students, and employers have become institutions of higher education.Stakeholders: For parents and students, their accountability for the responsibilities of institutions of higher learning is more about whether students can obtain good learning experiences and learning experiences, and whether schools can produce graduates that meet social needs, and can According to the needs of enterprises and society, carry out applied research that directly inputs production and increases benefits.
Answer: A.The popularization of higher education is susceptible to the social climate of quick success

context: With its gorgeous colors and beautiful dancing posture, the butterfly has won the reputation of "flying flowers" and "dance of nature".The rich colors of the butterfly wings and various patterns create this beautiful elf.Some butterflies are in When flying in the sun, the wings will flash with metallic light.Some butterfly wings can have a single color to a whole body, and there are butterfly colors that can be rich and dazzling.Some people even collected Arabic numerals 1-9 on butterfly wings and 26 English alphabets shaped patterns.
Answer: A.The butterfly is the embodiment of beauty in nature

context: The international promotion activities of Chinese that are currently being comprehensively expanded to all parts of the world must take into account the current status of overseas Chinese ethnic cultures, and comprehensively promote the international promotion of Chinese, promote Chinese culture to develop soft power, and support overseas Chinese culture from China.The mother of culture is born, and it is another thing to become the ethnic culture of the local society.If the former replaces the latter, it will confuse the boundaries between Chinese learning a mother tongue and learning a foreign language, and confuse and cooperate with overseas Chinese to build their own ethnic groups.The boundary between culture and the promotion of Chinese culture is not conducive to maintaining and developing the policy relationship between the Chinese and China.
Answer: A.Attention should be paid to maintaining and developing the normal relations between overseas Chinese and China

context: Ballet, in China, has been more than a century since it was performed in the court in the late Qing Dynasty; it has also been taught for nearly a century in Russia since the 1920s in Shanghai.Ballet does have a great distance from the traditional Chinese aesthetics, but the Chinese It can be accepted smoothly, and it has never been interrupted for a century.Even in the years of the Cultural Revolution, ballet still ran on the stage and took on the role of "model".Ballet, once a culture appreciated by European courts, entered China but realized Chinalization A number of Chinese players boarded the podium of the international arena.
Answer: A.Ballet also has a long tradition in China
