context: In the 1990s, Kodak was recognized as one of the five most valuable brands in the world.According to statistics, Kodak holds at least 100 digital images and image patents.However, the market is changing rapidly, and after the peak, Kodak irreparably began to go downhill.Kodak has also tried to transform, for example, it had wanted to copy the successful business model to the newly expanded pharmaceutical and chemical industries, but it failed due to lack of relevant fields of technology and expertise.At the same time, Kodak was reluctant to give up high-profit margins.Leading the film business and gradually losing its leadership and innovation.
Answer: A.Past efforts and achievements are the company's most valuable asset

context: The full name of "Super Online Banking" is the "Online Payment Interbank Clearing System".By building "one-point access, multipoint docking" system architecture, it realizes "one-stop" online cross-bank financial management.It is a standardized cross-bank online research and development network developed in 2009.Financial service products, officially launched on August 30, 2010."Super Internet Banking" can not only use the current online banking services, but also query other bank accounts across banks, and even transfer money from other bank accounts to the current account across banks.
Answer: A.Inter-bank transfers and management of inter-bank accounts

context: The so-called good and bad actually originates from our measurement standards.Each child has its own characteristics, not only because of poor performance, it is positioned as a "poor student".What we want to cultivate is to have true integrity, kindness, and sincerity Waiting for beautiful and moral children, let them have a positive and optimistic attitude towards life, know how to respect themselves, respect others, have their own hobbies, be responsible, confident, tolerant, generous, and provide assistance when others need help Hands.
Answer: A.Cultivation of children's morals and attitudes to life is more important than achievement

context: Mass media is mainly carried out through newspapers, television, radio and other platforms.Interpersonal communication refers to holding forums, public open days and other activities to achieve interpersonal communication.New media combines the advantages of both mass media and interpersonal communication.With both comprehensiveness and precision, it can face millions or even tens of millions of audiences at the same time, and it can also achieve one-to-one communication between the communicator and the audience.Help us achieve two or even more retransmissions.
Answer: A.New media is based on mass media communication and interpersonal communication

context: When it comes to social justice, most people answer is equal opportunity.When talking about equal opportunity, people's minds often appear on the starting line in the arena.As long as everyone stands on the same starting line, competition is fair, so the final result Whatever it is, is fair.The question is: what conditions must be met before we can stand on the same starting line? Furthermore, when we use the metaphor of starting line to think about justice, what kind of moral imagination is behind it?
Answer: A.The concept of equal opportunity, not just staying on the same starting line

context: In some grass-roots units, there is always a phenomenon of "talking back" between the masses and cadres, and some of them also cause antagonism between the cadres and the masses.The reason is that some grassroots cadres have ignored the masses' "psychology".When people are criticized by others, the metropolis instinctively generates a sense of justification, that is, the "psychology of confession." Even if there are obvious and inexcusable wrongs, some people will say a few objective reasons To justify yourself and dilute the bad effects caused by your obsolescence.Generally speaking, the "psychology of confession" mainly has the following two manifestations: one is to explain the problem through confession, and the other is to avoid responsibility.
Answer: A.The reason why the masses "justify" themselves is to let cadres understand the real situation

context: The reason why Chinese culture has maintained strong vitality throughout its thousands of years of historical evolution is that Chinese culture has both distinctive ethnic characteristics and at the same time, it is good at absorbing relevant factors from different nationalities, different countries, and different regions as a mechanism to improve its own culture.The organic element that cultivates cultural abilities.This is why Cuban Babylonian culture and ancient Indian culture have disappeared one after another, while Chinese culture has endured for thousands of years without breaking innovation and creating new civilization miracles.
Answer: A.Only by continuously improving our own cultural mechanisms can we last forever

context: At present, domestic laws and regulations on the protection of personal information are scattered, lacking both a definition of personal information and an operable standard, the absence of law enforcement subjects, and insufficient enforcement of the law.As for the problems of personal information protection, industry discussions believe that there are three main aspects: protection The degree of definition is difficult to distinguish between legitimate or illegal use of personal information; information leakage and evidence collection, it is difficult to determine where the personal information is leaked; law enforcement efforts are unified, and it is difficult to ensure that the law enforcement standards of multiple regulatory entities are consistent.
Answer: A.Ensuring the full circulation of information while avoiding misuse of personal information

context: In recent years, social hotspots have frequently occupied our sights.From the poisoned milk powder incident to the dyed buns incident, it has undoubtedly brought a huge psychological burden and mental confusion to the general public; the salt robbing incident that once caused a national sensation is more normal for society.A shock of order.Obviously, these social hot events have brought destructive or even destructive effects on people's social life.But the most serious impact is the continued negative effects of these social hot events.Proliferation, and public confusion and anxiety caused by it.
Answer: A.Call for effective suppression of the spread of negative effects of hot social events

context: In the public impression, every increase in tailings management always occurs after a serious tailings dam breakout accident.However, the surprise tailings management method is unlikely to work lastingly.A large number of tailings are accompanied by the mine.Mining continues to increase.With the depletion of the mine, the tailings stored over the years are piled up on the slopes of the river bank.Because of the lack of effective treatment methods at the technical level, they can only remain in nature in an unsafe way of exposure.
Answer: A.We always attack tailings after accidents

context: The goal of the State's implementation of the "nutrition improvement plan for rural compulsory education students" is to effectively improve the nutritional status and health of rural children.Due to the geographical environment, food resources, dietary habits, and traditional folk customs of different places, to achieve this goal, it is necessary to achieve this goal.On the basis of empirical research on the health and nutritional status of rural children in various regions, we will propose a reasonable food structure and improvement plan according to local conditions.
Answer: A.The nutrition of rural children needs scientific improvement

context: China's scientific and technological progress has attracted worldwide attention.In 2010, China's total human resources in science and technology ranked first in the world, the number of international scientific and technological papers ranked second in the world, and the number of invention patents ranked third in the world ...but the survey showed that China's talent capital The contribution rate of economic growth is much lower than that of Western countries, and the external dependence of key technologies is significantly higher than that of Western countries.
Answer: A.Lack of support for key core technologies has become a bottleneck in technological development

context: The popularity of the Internet has made people begin to look beyond the perspective of historical development based on nations and nations, and see frequent interactions and exchanges between various regions and cultures in the world.And some multinational companies have taken advantage of the development and convenience of modern social information transmission.Its various departments can be distributed in various corners of the world according to needs, and communicate through telecommunications technology and the Internet.
Answer: A.The Internet has brought the world into an era of very convenient information exchange

context: Many economists count that India's prospects are bright because of its rapid population development, because it will gradually harvest the "demographic dividend".In the next ten years, India's employment will increase by 26%.These young labor will significantly reduce the dependency ratio of the population, This will increase the savings rate, promote investment, and promote economic development.However, the premise of turning the young population into labor is whether a country's education facilities are complete and adequate training is provided.What India lacks is also here, and research shows that although new Increase the labor population by 12.8 million, but India can only train 3.1 million people each year, only 1/4 of the new population and the remaining 3/4 will become a burden on social development.
Answer: A."Demographic Dividend" Can Promote Economic Takeoff

context: Deterrence is actually to cause fear in the imaginary enemy, thereby preventing him from doing things that are not good for himself.However, there are two roots to this fear: first, the opponent must recognize the strength of the deterrent, it is difficult to imagine a weak country can deter the powerful United States.Second, the adversary must also believe that the deterrent will use its strength to achieve its purpose.In other words, the adversary must confirm the intention of the deterrent.If the opponent believes that the deterrent is not truly offensive Intent, so simple to show strength or verbal threat is meaningless.
Answer: A.Deterrence achieves the purpose of deterrence by making potential opponents believe in their strength

context: In August 2012, the "Administrative Measures for the Clinical Application of Antibacterials", which is known as "Only the most stringent 'limitation of resistance orders'", was officially implemented.According to the "Measures", antibacterials will be based on safety, efficacy, and bacterial resistance Factors such as price, price, are divided into three levels: non-restricted use level, restricted use level and special use level.Medical institutions and medical personnel should strictly grasp the indications of using antibacterial drugs to prevent infection.Physicians who use antibacterial drugs in violation of regulations will be punished by Warning, restricting prescription rights, revoking practicing certificates until criminal liability is pursued.
Answer: A.Antimicrobial abuse will be effectively curbed

context: Stem cells are a primitive cell population with the potential for self-renewal and multi-directional differentiation, and are the cells of origin that form various tissues and organs.When mature somatic cells of the body die due to aging or injury, stem cells produce their substitutes at any time to maintain various cell regeneration And tissue repair.Unfortunately, with age, the ability of the stem cell population to proliferate and differentiate will be severely weakened.From this perspective, intervention and restoration of stem cell vitality in some way are expected to repair tissue function and achieve Delays the effects of aging.
Answer: A.The human desire to achieve youthful beauty depends on the application of stem cell technology

context: The "cloud plan" is likely to trigger a new round of information technology revolution and have a profound impact on the international situation.Simply put, "cloud" is the use of Internet technology for remote computing and data storage.As long as the user has one that can access the Internet Ordinary computers or mobile phones can perform complex calculations, and personal data can also be easily stored in the "cloud" through the Internet for storage.From a hardware perspective, the "cloud" is a group of computers, each of which includes hundreds of thousands of units, and even Millions of computers, which may be high-performance servers, or ordinary computers connected to the Internet, or even mobile phones.
Answer: A."Cloud" is a computer cluster of hundreds of thousands or even millions

context: Recently, reports that China s 2,000 tons of ground trench oil processed bio-kerosene was bought by Dutch Airlines have shocked nationals: Gutter oil has such high-end uses! It turned out that the trench oil processed by special technology can be used as a kind of bio-kerosene to replace traditional diesel and gasoline for aviation flight.Through strict national legislation and law enforcement, advanced technology investment and people's increasing environmental awareness and health Awareness, the kitchen waste oil is recycled, and after processing, it flows into industrial and mining, power plants, and even home car fuel tanks.
Answer: A.Countries around the world are committed to researching the recycling of trench oil

context: China's rare earth industry is facing internal and external difficulties: domestic, excessive consumption of resources, serious environmental pollution, illegal mining has been repeatedly banned, and a large number of rare earths have been exported and smuggled in disguise; foreign countries, the United States, Europe, and Japan have continued to export rare earth The pressure on China and the ultra-intensive mining for more than half a century have caused China's rare earth resources reserves and guaranteed years to continue to decline.Some experts pointed out that compared with the amount of human resources, China is now a country with rare earth shortages, but Industrialization has not been completed, and a larger amount of rare earth will be needed in the future.
Answer: A.China's rare earth resources are scarce and per capita resources are low due to over-intensity mining

context: China s neighbor, Japan, is suffering from the dilemma of population reduction.In 1999, Japan s total fertility rate dropped to 1.57%, known as the 1.57 crisis.In 2006, this number fell to 1.04%.Japanese media was surprised Calling "the declining population has reached the point of endangering the country's rise and fall".At the same time, in China with a large population, the problem of declining birth is also emerging.According to the 2010 national census data, China s population aged 0 to 16 accounts for 16.60%, A decrease of 6.2 percentage points compared with 2000, and the total fertility rate is about 1.1%.Demographers exclaimed that China has entered the ranks of the country with the lowest fertility rate and a severe childbirth rate.
Answer: A.The phenomenon of the declining birthrate in China has not yet attracted enough attention from Chinese people

context: The preferential treatment and resettlement work should fully reflect the care of the party, the government and the people for the revolutionary heroes.There are many types of service targets for preferential resettlement, and the aging is outstanding.There are two major types of preferential treatment and resettlement, 27 types in 5 categories.And the service guarantee process is complicated.For example, receiving a resettlement key target, you need to review the resettlement plan, implement housing construction and purchase funds, issue a resettlement plan, and handle transfer procedures.After receiving it, you are also responsible for implementing political treatment and living.Dozens of service management contents such as benefits, medical insurance.
Answer: A.Preferential resettlement work is highly political and requires high policy guarantees

context: Public service advertising in China has a history of more than 20 years.However, for a long time, public service advertising in China has been largely dominated by the government.Its independence and autonomy cannot be fully reflected.Most of the media produced and released public service because of administrative orders Advertising, the poor awareness of actively taking on social responsibility, the direct result is insufficient public service advertising vitality and failed to form a wide range of social influence.In addition, driven by economic interests, the media will use public service advertising as a means of image formation, resulting in Public service ads are disconnected from the general public.
Answer: A.Development History of Public Service Advertising in China

context: "Knowing the world" as a literary criticism principle and method was first proposed by Mencius, a thinker during the Warring States Period.Mencius believed that future generations would have to associate ancient people, but it was not possible to read their poems.They must also understand their behaviors and The era of their lives, in this way, can they understand the poems of the ancients, and they can be intimate with the hearts of the ancients and become confidants.
Answer: A.Human minds can communicate and resonate

context: At present, although the floating population has entered urban work and life, it has not truly integrated into urban society.The isolation of the system objectively strengthens the geographical, rural, and kinship of the population, exacerbates social differentiation, and a new dual structure appears in the city.In some cities, the floating population and the registered population are upside down, and there is a conflict of economic interests between the migrant population and the local population, which can easily inspire social conflicts.The long-term separation of floating family members has resulted in child custody responsibilities, emotional loss, instability of marriage, and left-behind elderly and women suffer Violations and other issues affect family happiness and long-term social stability.
Answer: A.Institutional segregation makes it impossible for migrants to integrate into urban society

context: Good officials must not only be honest and serve the public, but also be able to do practical things.What the people expect is "reformers", "behavioral officials" are not "unreliable officials".Without a tolerant and harmonious environment for officers and entrepreneurs, cadres will be fearful in their work, afraid to surpass and explore, and even less afraid to reform and innovate.When they see that some comrades have been held accountable for mistakes, they will remember Fear.To promote cadres who want to do what they want to do, we must adhere to the "three divisions", that is, we must separate the mistakes of prior trials from those of known reasons, distinguish exploratory experiments from lawlessness, and inadvertent negligence and private gain.differentiate
Answer: A.Establishing a mechanism for discerning officials to explore innovative behaviors

context: The cultural and creative industry is a new business format that integrates elements of culture, creativity, technology, capital, and manufacturing.Americans rely on a glass of water (Coca-Cola), a bread (McDonald's), a chip (Intel), and a little mouse (Disney) Made a big creative industry.The profits and impact generated by these industries far exceed their automobile, steel and other industries.
Answer: A.The cultural and creative industry is a forward-looking and comprehensive business format

context: Although the current university admissions test has received a lot of criticism, however, the university's independent admissions test that has taken a ten-year journey may continue to be taken year after year.After all, the independent admissions test is to restore the function of university talent selection It is of positive significance and obvious effect to truly select the talents that are in line with the concept of educating people.Fudan University said that 30% of the undergraduate students who enrolled in the university have their own academic results.Most of the performance in areas such as innovation awareness and innovation ability is better than other students.
Answer: A.Able to overcome criticism

context: After the American Civil War, public health advocates called on the government to provide more public space-the pool called a "suspended pond" was born.At that time, clean water was clean and people could bathe directly in the river.But with the industrialization process, factories Sewage into the river increased, and the government eventually had to shut down most of the swimming pools.Even the remaining "suspended ponds" were introduced directly from the river in the past and turned to close the gates to introduce pure water from the outside.
Answer: A.People need more public space is the reason for the "suspended pond"

context: Four years ago, at the time when the Chinese economy was hit by the financial crisis, consumer vouchers were widely discussed as a policy suggestion to stimulate domestic demand, and the practice in Hangzhou, Chengdu, and other places also received some effects.However, there are certain requirements for large-scale hairstyle vouchers.The impact is also very complicated, and the results obtained in some pilot cities such as Hangzhou and Chengdu are not universally representative.
Answer: A.Hangzhou and degree pilot implementation of consumer vouchers to achieve results is only an accident

context: An enterprise should have a correct concept of business and mission.If the company's basic ideas and policies are clear, then managers can exercise strong leadership accordingly, and everyone can judge right and wrong based on these basic ideas and policies This way, it is easy to cultivate talents.On the contrary, the managers will lack consistency in the leadership of their subordinates, and they may be dominated by changes in the situation or personal emotions, which is not conducive to the cultivation of talents.
Answer: A.Strong leadership is a necessary condition for companies to cultivate talent

context: Big data presents a beautiful and terrifying future for human beings: the beauty is that it will bring us greater vision and newer discoveries, and then change our work and lifestyle; the terrible thing is that It brings us more risks and greater challenges.In addition to the security of the data itself, it is more about people's privacy.At the same time, in the research and formulation of policies for the development of big data, we need to break Ideological constraints to advance with the times and advance with the Internet; need a strong centralized unified command and coordination mechanism; need to handle the dialectical relationship between development and security; and actively balance the responsibility and responsibility of global governance.
Answer: A.Big data policy choices need to consider development and security

context: The key to the transformation of government functions is to properly handle the relationship with the market and society, ensure that the government is not "offside" in its relationship with the market and society, and "absent" in protecting basic public services such as people's livelihood and monitoring illegal activities.The government needs to clarify the boundary with the market and society, and clarify what the government should and should not do.On the one hand, further simplify the administration and decentralize the power so that the market plays a decisive role in the allocation of resources; The way of service stimulates social vitality and increases people's livelihood.
Answer: A.Distinguishing the differences between markets and society can clarify government functions

context: Aerospace technology was born out of the ballistic missile technology developed during the Second World War.It is very difficult to calculate the trajectory by manpower.This has led to the birth of the world's first computer.It is the entry of humans into the information age.Promote the birth and development of integrated circuits; nowadays, cargo codes are everywhere in supermarkets.This technology was born when Apollo used the barcode to manage spacecraft ....According to statistics, more than 1,100 new technologies developed and used in China this year.80% of the materials are completed under the traction of aerospace technology.At present, there are nearly 2,000 space technology achievements and used in communication, textile, petroleum, transportation, medical and other industries.
Answer: A.History of space technology development

context: Cities are not only the political, economic, cultural, technological and educational centers of a country or region, but they have also become powerful engines of economic growth.The three urban agglomerations of New York, Chicago and Los Angeles in the United States, and the three major cities of Tokyo, Hanshin and Nagoya The three major urban agglomerations, including the Yangtze River Delta, the Pearl River Delta, and the Bohai Rim, have contributed more than half of the country's economy.
Answer: A.It can be said that the economic development of a country mainly depends on the economic development of urban agglomerations.

context: Today, the boundaries and separation between natural sciences and social sciences have been broken.Multidisciplinary intersects and penetrates each other, which is the result of highly differentiated and highly integrated science, technology, economics, and social integration.Therefore, the structure of knowledge The rationality and diversification of science and technology are new and higher requirements for science and technology practitioners.
Answer: A.Deep integration has emerged between the natural and social sciences

context: Goldfish is actually a kind of artificial domesticated catfish.About 2000 years ago, ancient Chinese people began to breed silver carp.As food and ornamental fish.Over time, genetic mutations and artificial selection made orange and red on silver carp.The colors such as yellow and yellow changed its dull and boring image, and also created the colorful goldfish that we see today.In the 17th century, goldfish spread to Europe and to the United States in the 1850s.
Answer: A.The evolution of goldfish

context: The results of a survey show that if a family is very clean and spotless, the family's happiness index must be relatively low.The reason is that there must be a very critical person in this family.As long as you put things a little crooked, he is not comfortable In families with children, toys are not easy to take out and play, and they are always neatly placed there.It is a crime to stay in this family, not to mention the happiness index.
Answer: A.Very tidy, spotless family happiness index is low

context: In the 1980s, there was a slogan called "Start with me, start from now", and now advocate "speak less, do more practical things." Specifically in solving the problem of traffic jams, if everyone can "start with me "From now on," make fewer complaints, and observe more appropriate actions while driving.Traffic jams will definitely be greatly alleviated, that is, if drivers can be more aware, they do nt need so many traffic police.It can also have a good traffic order.
Answer: A.Creating good traffic order requires everyone's consciousness

context: There are many differences between animals and humans.According to evolutionary biologist Dawkins and others, the biggest difference may be the lack of "culture" in animals.Part of the behavior of individual wildlife in the environment can be traced back to its genes: individuals Even if there is cultural heritage between them, the impact is usually minimal.If two groups of wolves respond differently to the same scene, it is because their genetic characteristics are different, not because they have experienced different wolves history.Different wolf pack cultures.Even if animals learn complicated behaviors from humans because they get along with people, when he returns to the wild, it is almost impossible to teach the human skills he has learned to other animals, and he cannot change his race.Original behavior.
Answer: A.Common behaviors among race members

context: There are two seemingly contradictory trends in this era: on the one hand, with the improvement of people's education level and the diversification of access to information channels, people can make more rational judgments on various rumors: but on the other hand, information The explosive growth and technological advancement of rumors have also greatly accelerated the spread of rumors, and people often have no time to distinguish the authenticity of various kinds of information.Although it is always assumed that as long as the level of human rationality is continuously improved and the information is made transparent, rumors can be eliminated The soil produced, but so far this has only been an ideal.No society's information is completely correct.In many cases, people often unknowingly spread the information in order to learn the truth of their concerns as soon as possible.With rumors.
Answer: A.A certain level of human reason can prevent rumors

context: Through a series of experiments, scientists believe that money can stimulate people's exclusivity, which is likely to be a human instinct reaction, just as love has exclusivity.When there is a monetary interest in cooperation, people will instinctively protect themselves.Therefore, they will respond to the other party with an offensive attitude and generate a certain degree of aversion.As a result, there are various phenomena that money destroys love, pollutes affection, and cuts off the friendship, showing that humanity is really hard to beat the copper smell.However, experiments have also confirmed that while people have an exclusive mind in the face of money, their independence and creativity have also been significantly enhanced.Moreover, money, as an important product of human civilization, must always exist, and avoiding it is obviously unrealistic.
Answer: A.Money is a double-edged sword

context: Many children can only listen to praise, but can't listen to any objections.Some children are proud, fragile, and suspicious.When they encounter something unpleasant, they will have extreme actions.This is the so-called "eggshell." Psychology ".Excessive pride and all kinds of doting are the most direct causes of this kind of psychology.Parents are advised to create a setback on the child's smooth growth path, so that the child will maintain self-confidence in adversity, learn to maintain optimism in the face of setbacks, and cultivate children's Resilience and anti-frustration.In addition, parents must learn to say "no" to their children and let their children know that not all requirements can be met, so that they learn to accept and reject.
Answer: A.Parents should adopt appropriate parenting methods for "eggshell psychology"

context: The horizon was once very distant, and now it suddenly entered, which is what is called close to the horizon.What happened on the horizon, such as where it went on strike, where it became turbulent, and where the coup d'tat, as long as you go online, in a blink of an eye, we can know everything.Filled with indignation, emotional excitement, and anxiety, even more worried than eating a fly, hoping to put on wings to help drive an airplane and drive a ship.And what happened around him, such as which day was the mother s birthday, what was the name of the child of a relative s family, When does the wife's hairstyle change, we don't know at all.Even the old man beside him fell down on the side of the road, glanced at those who passed by him, and speeded up his flight, no one was willing or dared to The old man who fell over was in support.
Answer: A.Explain that people have broadened their horizons through the Internet

context: High-paid poverty is one of the anxiety disorders of urban white-collar workers.From a sociological point of view, he can be understood as a high-paid white-collar salary, but because of various high debts and living costs, there are often "relative poverty" that income does not meet expenditure.From the perspective of personal career development, it can be understood as having higher incomes in some workplaces, but lacking a sense of professional value, unclear career planning, and unsatisfied inner demands.As a result, professional psychological anxiety has arisen.
Answer: A.Most urban white-collar workers suffer from high-paying poverty

context: After the start of the Industrial Revolution, the burning of fossil fuels (coal, oil, natural gas) has become larger and larger, increasing the concentration of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere.At the same time, forest fires caused by lightning, insect pests, deforestation, grassland decline and forest damage have also caused Green plants that can absorb carbon dioxide have been destroyed.Therefore, to control global warming, we must change the energy structure and vigorously plant trees.Some scientists have pointed out that only the use of nuclear fuels instead of fossil fuels can fundamentally prevent the increase of the greenhouse effect.
Answer: A.Exploring the main causes of global warming

context: At present, "culture" has become one of the hottest words.How to inherit and carry forward traditional culture, form the Chinese people's own culture, and strengthen our cultural soft power has become a hot topic.But this consensus is actually quite vague and many controversies Born because of this.Learn traditional Chinese characters, wear Tang costumes, and start classes ...the excitement surrounding the "traditional culture" is one after another, but the discussion behind them is inseparable from a deep analysis of the concept of "culture".
Answer: A.Discussing "What is culture"

context: In education in the UK, the object of children's respect is not limited to family and friends, but also includes love and responsibility for all lives.The love of small animals is the nature of the child, and cherish and care for small animals as the entry point to the child Cherish life is a kind of kindergarten in Britain, and it is generally adopted in elementary schools.In addition, some safari organizations or ambulance centers in the UK also cooperate with primary and secondary schools, and often organize students to visit the injured animals and abandoned pets they receive and treat.In the context, parents will also deliberately educate their children to understand the meaning of life, and pass on rationality and tenderness from generation to generation.
Answer: A.Respect for life can convey reason and tenderness

context: Promoted by the global "smart wave" and related policies, many parts of China have proposed the slogan of "smart city", and will build "smart city" as a way to cultivate competitiveness, respond to the financial crisis, expand employment of citizens, and seize the high ground of future technology.However, it should be seen that the current "smart city" practice is mostly in the concept construction period, and people's understanding of "smart city" is not limited to the smart city or digital city levels such as the Internet of Things, the Internet, and cloud computing.The emergence of "smart cities" in major media also makes it difficult to distinguish which are urban marketing methods and which are the actual conditions of urban construction.
Answer: A.Building a "smart city" is an important strategy for future urban development

context: Traditional Chinese medicine is composed of traditional medicine from Han, Tibetan, Mongolian and other ethnic groups.It has the mystery of traditional oriental medicine, and often contains myths and legends.Many of its principles cannot be used in modern medicine.The theory explains the science.But this "mysterious" medicine often has magical effects.For example, Tibetan medicine, for a long time, treats patients with plants, animals, minerals and foods unique to the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau.It has a good effect on a variety of diseases that make modern medicine difficult, including cancer and stroke.
Answer: A.The composition and characteristics of traditional Chinese medicine

context: From the perspective of high-level determination and public consciousness, the pace of air pollution control is constantly accelerating.Adjusting the energy structure and industrial transformation and upgrading requires more government action, which is an undisputed priority.At the same time, as a citizen, it can be achieved Fewer complaints and more from your own, such as not setting off firecrackers, taking more public transportation, etc.
Answer: A.Every citizen should bear corresponding responsibilities in the treatment of air pollution

context: The people's well-being in the current sense is different from the simple state of food and clothing in history, but includes extremely rich content: including the rights and dignity of the people, as well as the income and consumption of the people.It also involves freedom, security, social security and Mental life, etc.
Answer: A.The meaning of people's well-being has changed dramatically

context: The discussion of public affairs in modern society has become a normal state.Unlike ordinary "public intellectuals" and the media, the participation of think tanks in public affairs should be based on scientific analysis and demonstration, rather than emotional venting and value judgment disputes..Think tanks should try their best to start with the materials and objective facts they have obtained, complete the screening and judgment of complex data, and establish a persistent predictive analysis system.
Answer: A.Think tank is a professional institution involved in public affairs management

context: From the perspective of development trends, the goal of diluting GD.P (gross domestic product) growth is the general trend, because one-sided excessive pursuit of this indicator is not enough to meet the people's needs for green mountains, green water, rest assured food, good education, convenient travel, and healthy work , Enjoy a higher level of expectations and longing for the good life such as old age.
Answer: A.Improper pursuit of the GD.P index

context: The results of a survey showed that those with the most positive and optimistic attitudes had the greatest improvement in dietary structure during the duration of the study, while the most negative and pessimistic respondents not only preferred to choose a less healthy diet from the beginning, but also After intervention by various means, the improvement is not ideal.Researchers have pointed out that self-control is the key to making it easier for optimists to successfully quit bad habits such as smoking, drinking and overeating.
Answer: A.The dietary structure depends on the mood of a person

context: The decline in economic growth stems from an aging population.Is this really the case? Some conclusions point out: the younger the population structure, the poorer the country, and the richer the other way around.So why fear to age? It is thought that aging makes people vulnerable, and people over 65 years of age are a burden on society.However, some people are far more productive than others, and it does not matter about age.It turns out that the aging population requires a combination of manpower Considering capital, especially education and health status, young people in most countries around the world are more educated than older people, and their methods of improving productivity by improving education may be able to make up for the shortage of a small population.
Answer: A.People are fully capable of coping with population ageing

context: People are deeply affected by haze weather.As everyone knows, there is also a haze phenomenon in the spirit.If it is not removed in time, it will make the soul depressed and dispirited, and the mind will be hazy, and the harm will not be less than the haze weather.In modern society, the pace is fast, the pressure is heavy, and there are many contradictions.This spiritual haze has many harms to personal life and various causes.How to adjust the mood and dispel the haze? context: The etiquette system formed during the Western Zhou Dynasty first adopted the method of regulating people's daily behavior standards, and carried this tradition into the upper society and home life.Although the "Western Zhou Dynasty" "does not lower people," the original purpose of establishing the etiquette system is to maintain the interests of slave owners and nobles, strengthened the social hierarchy of slaves, in order to coordinate the relationship within the slave owner class, but after entering the Spring and Autumn Period, with the slave system "the etiquette and music collapsed", the rules of "knowledge down" In the situation of "popularity", this tradition and etiquette system have therefore penetrated into a wider range of social life; it has become a code of conduct and norms widely observed by society.

context: There are two differences between the brain and the computer.One is that it is easy to forget, and the other is that it is prone to errors.This seems to be a disadvantage, but it is an advantage.Forgetting occurs automatically, which allows us to clear out unnecessary information without effort.Unexpectedly good thoughts make room.If there is no such space, good thoughts will fly into the darkness because they cannot find a habitat.It is a wonderful talent for the human brain to rely on it to make mistakes in relationships.We often have unexpected discoveries and brand new ideas where there is no connection.These two differences illustrate the same thing, that is, the power of the computer is only to the information, but the power of the human brain is to let the information lead to thought.

context: In the face of nature, there is no good or bad for everything.Darwin's theory of evolution in The Origin of Species puts humans in a very ordinary position.However, many people have always been reluctant to accept this view, but Preconceivedly distorted Darwin's theory of evolution as a theory of progress and spread it.According to evolutionary theory, it is difficult to predict the evolutionary trend of a species, because the mechanism of evolution includes two factors-the environments and the species itself.We cannot predict changes in the environment.It is also difficult for us to fully grasp how the species itself inherits and mutates.Evolution theory can only explain to a large extent, rather than accurately predicting it, so it is unreasonable to give the evolutionary trend of species based on evolution theory.Although evolution theory is difficult to describe the evolution of species Details, but still helps people have a deep understanding of life.
Answer: A.The fundamental difference between evolution and progress

context: Experts found during the test that although students who lack vision can answer difficult questions, they cannot remember simple words.At the same time, lack of sleep may cause irreversible damage to children's learning and memory.Studies have found that when sleep is inadequate, some functional areas of the brain appear.Different levels of inhibition, which makes students often make mistakes when doing some simple learning.When faced with difficulties, because of additional activation and memory, attention to the closely related prefrontal cortex area to compensate for missing functions, students answer correctly The rate and response time were not significantly affected.Experts believe that although there is not enough evidence that lack of sleep will directly affect IQ, the existing evidence can prove that the attention and memory of students with impaired vision are indeed affected.

context: At present, education-related topics often appear as "the confrontation between the two armed forces": one side is an education expert, who said bitterly that successful education must stimulate the interest of students; the other side is parents and teachers, who agree that "exams are big, and scores are highest" Experts point out that such "utilitarianism" has made children's nature and interests ruthlessly stifled.However, under the condition of insufficient high-quality education resources, parents do not want to try to get their children to enter a prestigious school, what more wise choices can there be ?

context: Such a ship is moored in the British National Ship Museum.It was launched in 1894, encountered icebergs 138 times in the upper part of the Atlantic Ocean, hit the reef 116 times, fired 13 times, and masted its mast 207 times.What made this ship famous is A lawyer who came here for sightseeing.At that time, he had just lost a lawsuit and the client had committed suicide not long ago.Whenever he encountered such a thing, he always felt a sense of guilt and he didn't know how to comfort these misfortunes.When he saw the ship, he suddenly had an idea, why not let them come and visit the ship? So he copied down the history of the ship and hung it in his law firm along with a picture of the ship.Whenever a client asked him to defend, no matter he won or lost, he suggested they go and see the ship.ferry.
Answer: A.Let go of your burden to move forward

context: According to reports, although current news about global warming, melting seawater and rising sea levels has frequently made headlines, some climate analysts have pointed out that during the winter in the Southern Hemisphere, the total mass of large ice floes in the Antarctic waters is actually constantly In fact, in late September, satellite data showed that the sea ice area around Antarctica reached the largest extent ever, with an area of 7.51 million square miles, about 19.44 million square kilometers, and also showing Slowly increasing, increasing at an average annual rate of about 1%.
Answer: A.Not all global climate is warming

context: The customary behavior pattern in the process of tea production and consumption is usually expressed in the form of tea ceremony, tea custom, and tea art.It is a traditional etiquette in our country; Sending tea thousands of miles expresses nostalgia for loved ones; in the old days, folks used tea as a ceremony, called "tea ceremony", and sent "tea ceremony" as "putting tea".In ancient times, the proverb said "a woman does not eat "Two teas", that is, the women's house no longer accepts other wedding gifts after receiving the "tea ceremony"; there is also worship of tea with tea, worship of tea, etc.As for various places, the drinking habits of various nationalities are colorful, various Tea drinking methods and tea art programs are also full of beautiful flowers.
Answer: A.Tea culture in ancient poetry

context: Everyone knows that biodiversity is very important to protect the earth's ecological environment, but our eyes have been attracted by those plants that can be seen with the naked eye, completely forgetting that the largest treasure trove of biodiversity on earth belongs to microorganisms and they The effect is much larger than that of animals and plants.For example, the ocean absorbs at least general carbon dioxide in the atmosphere, and this absorption process is very complicated, with a large number of microorganisms involved, but humans know very little about them, so they also It is difficult to predict how they will respond to climate change.Fortunately, with the improvement of D.NA.sequencing technology, scientists have finally started to enter this mysterious micro-world.
Answer: Application of A.D.NA.Sequencing Technology in Microbial Observation

context: Anti-tradition is the mainline of the Chinese revolution.After the May 4th Movement, learning the West has become the pursuit of truth from the West.There is nothing wrong with learning the West, but it is very wrong to treat the West as truth.China does not reject other civilizations and values However, Western discourse dominated by Western cultures cannot explain everything in China, so Chinese culture must become the subject.Therefore, we, especially intellectuals, must exert great efforts from the state of thinking and thinking that have been "colonized" for more than a century.Liberated.The West continues to learn, but China's subjective status must also be established.
Answer: A.How to promote Chinese culture

context: The frequent use of antibiotics in animal husbandry can proliferate microorganisms carrying antibiotic resistance genes.In some cases, antibiotic resistance genes can become highly mobile, meaning that they can migrate to those that are pathogenic to the human body.Bacteria.In this way, when humans get sick and then take antibiotics, because the bacteria are already resistant, the original magic drugs will lose their effectiveness.
Answer: A.The human body will develop resistance to antibiotics

context: In the 1930s, a British scholar predicted that there would be a serious shortage of copper resources around the world based on the results of his own research.The current situation is that the U.S.Geological Survey has estimated that the copper resources on the earth's surface can be at least It reaches 3 billion tons and is available for human use for 185,000 years.With the improvement of human exploration technology, this number may continue to rise in the future.
Answer: A.Technology can only be improved by constantly correcting mistakes

context: Modern European cities are very different from medieval cities and contemporary industrial cities.Medieval cities emerged and gained a foothold as a check and balance force for the rights of feudal lords, and in the protected autonomous areas of the time were shelters for the activities of merchants and craftsmen It is not plundered by feudal masters.On the contrary, modern cities are dwelling places favored by the nobles of traditional rural residences (such as bourgeois landlords), and are new power centers that place surrounding villages under their influence.Another feature is that the tertiary industry occupies an overwhelming advantage in urban functions, at the cost of damaging productive activities, which was the core of medieval cities and regained this position in the later era of industrialization.
Answer: A.Productive activities

context: Good strategy makers not only need strong logic analysis skills, but also strong direct feelings.They must be both excellent economists and psychologists.Research on human cognition has found that if strategic leaders can use Lenovo thinks that it is usually better to use and persuade all parties to accept the opportunity to stay away from the status quo.Strategic innovation not only depends on rational analysis, but also requires intuitive inspiration.The innovation strategy is the result of a combination of rationality and perceptualism.
Answer: A.Strategic innovation requires support from economics and psychology

context: Fifty years ago, the world's population was only about half of what it is today.Humans had hoped to use the so-called "green revolution" to organize the imminent food crisis.The surge in the use of hybrid seeds and fertilizers has achieved some results, but humans have also paid a heavy ecological burden.Costs.Statistics show that global food production has nearly doubled compared to the era when our parents lived, but the cost is also huge: the consumption of surface water and groundwater by agricultural production has tripled.
Answer: A.Lack of human understanding of the nature of the food crisis

context: Due to the influence of knowledge, nature, experience, and the external environment, everyone's preferences for reading content vary widely.From the perspective of learning, carrying forward the spirit of nails in the areas of interest and delving into it will undoubtedly give you a more comprehensive understanding of the field.System and deep.But things that are not of interest may also be exactly what we lack.This is not only because of the limited nature of interest itself, but also the long-term immersion in specific fields, which often solidifies this interest, and Form a vicious circle of less interest and rejection, resulting in shorter short boards, and reading properly can cultivate the ability and quality to obtain social recognition and adapt to the needs of the times.
Answer: A.Reading should conform to its own characteristics

context: Statistics show that since the founding of the People's Republic of China, 80% of more than 1,100 high-tech materials that China has developed and put into civilian use have been developed due to the development needs of aerospace technology.As we all know, aerospace technology The requirements are extremely high.As a result, every advancement of China Aerospace has persecuted the electronics industry, and the equipment manufacturing industry has been continuously upgraded and upgraded.The ultimate beneficiaries of these are ordinary people.

context: Subject to increasing costs and shrinking budgets, NASA has had to postpone or even cancel many research projects.Some worry that the U.S.Congress will not approve costly projects such as bringing Martian rocks back to Earth Analysis-This is the only way scientists think they can determine if the activity has ever been alive.

context: When can Chinese young directors come to a "dynasty change" of film language and film achievements, not just the fifth and sixth generation on the baton of generations? context: It is said that there are more than one hundred gardens in Suzhou, but I have not visited more than ten.I have also visited some gardens in other places.If I want to talk about the general impression, I think that Suzhou gardens are models of gardens in all parts of our country.It is more or less affected by Suzhou gardens.Therefore, if anyone wants to appreciate our gardens, Suzhou gardens should not be missed.

context: In an era of underdeveloped productivity, war has become the most important way to compete for resources.Youth are the most important participants in the war, and to win the war, young people must have strong physical fitness.In order to win the war, each City-state youth organized to train.As the leader of all Greece, the Athens city-state had a population of 250,000 during its heyday.At the same time, Corinth had a population of 90,000, and some city-states had only 5,000 or less.The larger the population, the higher the proportion of youth.The more the city-state is able to occupy an advantageous position in the competition.
Answer: A.Youth play an important role in the competition

context: In recent years, cultural chaos has become more and more serious.Among them, the garbage in the Internet culture is the worst, and the social problems caused by it are also the most serious.It has caused considerable harm to the construction of a harmonious society in China, especially for thousands of people.The poisoning of thousands of young people, if they do not take timely measures, will inevitably form a crisis of drawing salaries to the sustainable development of the Chinese nation, and it must not be taken lightly.History has already proven that cultural chaos will lead to mental chaos, and chaotic thoughts will definitely lead to chaotic behavior.
Answer: A.Internet culture chaos must be treated with fierce medicine

context: It is necessary to prevent the phenomenon of "big and small years" in vegetable production due to subjective factors.In 2008, the price of garlic was sluggish, and some farmers lost information on the cultivation of garlic.In 2009, garlic production was reduced.Since then, the price of garlic has risen along the way.There are plans to maintain information symmetry on species, variety structure, and time to market, and improve and improve the detection and early warning mechanisms for agricultural products, in order to guide farmers' production and stabilize market supply.
Answer: A.Vegetable price fluctuations are a normal phenomenon under market regulation

context: Corn is an important food crop, and it is also a high-yield and high-quality feed.It has become the main raw material for the feed industry.At present, there are more than 500 processed products made with corn as raw materials.Corn starch can be eaten directly or can be further processed into Sugars and various chemical products such as alcohol, acetic acid, acetone, butanol can also be used in textile, papermaking, pharmaceutical, winemaking, and other industries.The fat contained in the embryo accounts for more than 85% of the oil content of the grain.Corn oil becomes a high-quality edible oil and can be made into margarine.
Answer: A.Today, the comprehensive utilization of crop harvests is becoming more and more extensive.

context: Experts believe that the family atmosphere is not harmonious, and the lack of parental care is one of the reasons that cause young people to experience mental and spiritual problems and then become online fans.The family is the key place for children to experience emotions and develop emotional intelligence.Sense, respect, intimacy and love, children are likely to escape fear and loneliness in online games and seek comfort.Fathers who are busy working and mothers who love to criticize are often "good at" creating such an emotional ecology.If one is full of adventure spirit When a boy who seeks excitement lives a monotonous and immutable life, the online game world naturally looks wonderful and infinite.
Answer: A.Children's emotional supply should be guaranteed as much as possible

context: Languages that are distributed in different places use long-term development processes and have accumulated common or unique experiences in production and life.These experiences or knowledge systems are all condensed in the language.Each language group has a different understanding of nature.It has reached different depths and formed a complementary distribution of cognitive structure, which together constitutes a broad and deep knowledge system for human beings.
Answer: A.Human knowledge systems are preserved and constructed verbally by different groups

context: Mrs Thatcher said during her lifetime that China will not become the world's superpower.Today, China's D.is a television, not an idea.She looks at China from a Western centric perspective and believes that China's knowledge system cannot participate in the world.The construction of a knowledge system.China cannot become a big country in knowledge production.Even if China's economy is rising rapidly, it can at best be a big country in material production.It is still a small country that cannot be taken seriously in terms of spiritual and cultural production, innovation and even export.Although the words are sharp, they remind us that the West does not value the blind improvement of material wealth, but also values the ability of a large country to participate in international affairs and the strength of cultural output.
Answer: A.The West is skeptical that China can become a superpower

context: When a cold blizzard sweeps the pasture, the temperature will quickly drop below zero.The herd will usually face away from the storm and slowly move to the downwind.When finally blocked by the fence, they will have to squeeze together, eventually leading to a large number of cattle.Death.But there is a kind of Hereford cattle, but they will face the storm together side by side, bow their heads, and face the raging snowstorm.As a result, the mortality rate is the lowest, and the loss is the smallest.
Answer: A.Unity is strength

context: From the appearance, the structure of the container is too simple, and even makes people feel disdainful.But after the advent of the container, freight became so cheap that a certain product was produced in the Eastern Hemisphere and shipped to New York for sale.Far more than in New York suburbs It is cost-effective to produce this product.The cost savings during transportation come from the improvement of tools and technology, and this tool and technology comes from the unique structure of the container that seems to be simple but functions as an artifact.So, simple technology can bring the transformation of the world to affect the process of the entire world.
Answer: A.Small design changes the big world

context: In today's Chinese literary research, some people believe that the westernization of the enterprise market is equivalent to modernization.In fact, Chinese literary and artistic traditions are different from those of the West.They are freehand, freehand drawing, scattered perspective, longer than perception and feeling.Further compression.In fact, the excellent artists in the West will not use rationality to oppress the sensibility, they should be unified.For example, the modern development of Western painting was first influenced by Japan on the way forward, indicating that the freehand art in the East was greatly inspired With them, modernist painting began to depart from analysis and empirical analysis, and finally went further and further.This is the so-called "modernization" of western literature and art.Their direction is opposite-eastward.
Answer: A.The development direction of western art is unified

context: In the hype of entertainment, privacy and personal dignity have been sacrificed to the viewing effect, and the moral bottom line has given way to economic benefits.What is more serious is that excessive entertainment allows people to only meet the entertainment needs, and lacks attention to social groups and ignores them.Exist, ignoring their needs.
Answer: A.Ignoring its due social responsibility

context: The traditional Chinese concept is that traditional Chinese medicine is a vague concept.The quality of medicinal materials varies depending on the conditions under which the herbs are planted.But in fact, certain parameters of traditional Chinese medicine can be considered controllable.Taking German gingko yellow as an example, although the raw materials Ginkgo is also collected from all over China, and there are differences in the raw materials themselves, but after extraction through German technology, the product quality is eventually uniform.This also means that the post-production processing process has a certain buffering effect on the differences in the raw materials themselves.
Answer: A.Chinese medicine can be controlled by technology to a certain extent due to the difference in the quality of raw materials

context: It is generally believed that meat is the most nutritious.But many studies have proved that obesity caused by too much meat is actually a kind of nutritional deficiency.Among the obese people in European and American families, cases of osteoporosis are everywhere, why eat The more meat the more calcium deficiency? Meat is acidic food.When the acidic food is excessively ingested, the body's acid-base is out of balance, so the body's self-regulating function must mobilize calcium in various parts of the body, such as bones, and blood into the digestive tract for acid-base Balance, so that the calcium in the bones will be less and less.Modern people's lifestyle, eating habits and physiological metabolism make our body more and more like an acidic direction.And the acidic body will cause many diseases.The reason is caused by improper diet.
Answer: A.Too much meat is the main cause of obesity

context: The "melting furnace" and "mosaic" pair of symbols are used to describe the cultural features of celebrities in the United States and Canada.Although novel, they are too simplistic.The intention of the "melting furnace" is reminiscent of the high-temperature melting furnace of a steel plant.Melting everything that is invested in has the meaning of vitality and opening up the future, and mosaic is reminiscent of the colorful stained glass of the medieval church.He points to the magnificent traditions of the past.These two symbols represent the United States and Canada.Different nation-building paths and growth processes.
Answer: A.There are huge differences in American and Canadian culture

context: It is important to acknowledge that men and women have different qualities and skills in public life.For a long time, women have been considered to need to think and act like men in order to succeed.However, the differences between women and men are gradually seen as strength Sources, not weaknesses to be overcome.Pelosi, the first U.S.Women's House speaker in history, called on women to be themselves."The only person who can make your unique contribution is you.Your sincerity is your strength." But this does not mean that there is no obstacle to the road ahead.People have always judged women by double standards.Studies show that women's achievements are always underestimated and there is less room for them to make mistakes.
Answer: A.New understanding of women's power and obstacles to women's talent development

context: Under the premise of doing research honestly, it is very common for analysis of specific experimental results to understand deviations or even errors, which is a normal process of scientific development.It can be said that the analysis, conclusions and discussions of many academic papers exist to varying degrees.Misunderstandings or deviations.The debate on such academic issues is often one of the important driving forces for scientific development.The more cutting-edge scientific research, the more prone to misunderstandings and wrong conclusions.
Answer: A.Honest research is based on respecting the authenticity of the original experimental data

context: The large number of glass curtain walls used in public buildings is determined by the aesthetics of specific historical periods.Today, this wall form is changing towards low cost and high popularity.The original modern sense, international colors and mystery of glass curtain walls The halo is gradually fading, and the energy crisis has accelerated this process to a certain extent.For most cities in subtropical and temperate regions, the large-scale glass curtain wall gradually exposes its light pollution and high energy consumption.
Answer: A.Explain that the abuse of glass curtain walls will bring urban pollution and energy waste

context: London is one of the most congested cities in the world, and on the most crowded streets, the speed is even below 12 mph.In the face of this situation, the London government began to charge congestion fees for motor vehicles.It costs ꠸ per vehicle.For the first time, the congestion in London streets has improved, but over time, the congestion has rebounded.Soon, the congestion has reached a maximum, and the speed of London driving can only be 8 mph.It turns out that before charging congestion fees, many private car owners felt that the city's congestion also had its own responsibility, and unconsciously produced a "guilt", thereby intentionally or unintentionally reducing the time spent driving.However, when they paid After the ꠸ congestion fee, I thought that I had paid the price for "mistakes", and that driving trips were straightforward and without guilt.In many cases, we always want the other person to pay for the mistakes made by others.But Sometimes, the best way is to tolerate or even "allow" his mistakes.Only in this way can he feel guilty, so that he can remember this mistake for a long time, and never make the same mistake.
Answer: A.Only consider the rules

context: The term "cultural prose" is used to name a prose style that emerged in the late 1980s and a subsequent phenomenon of prose creation.In fact, it lacks academic support because this name cannot explain "culture" and "prose" The relationship between "prose" and "big prose".However, it does reveal to some extent the main characteristics of a prose style, and it obviously contains the planning behavior adapted to the reader's market.Therefore, the naming of "cultural prose" has succeeded It has seduced and guided quite a lot of prose authors, readers, and researchers.Now, when I understand and respect the naming of "cultural prose" in my writing, I can't help but point out: the success of a simple naming, giving The production and dissemination of knowledge brings convenience, but it also condones the laziness of thought.
Answer: A.Changed the way people think about prose

context: It is not uncommon for contemporary Chinese people to "write and forget characters".In the Internet era, because we are used to typing on keyboards, more and more people suffer from "writing disorder".But the deeper reason is that people are embarrassed by Chinese characters.Under the impetuous mentality, people are quite hasty about the writing of Chinese characters, or even make a mistake, and mistakes are wrong.Failure to adhere to the correct writing will lead to falsehoods, which is true for Chinese characters and Chinese language and culture.It s extremely embarrassing.The efficiency of the keyboard era and the fun of writing with a pen are not a "two choices" relationship.In front of speed and efficiency, we can use the keyboard, but when we do nt need to pursue speed and efficiency too much, we Can you pick up the long-lost pen, write a letter, and write a few poems? This is not only a heritage of Chinese character culture, but also a way to gain warmth and sincere communication.
Answer: A.Analyze the crisis brought by the keyboard input to the cultural heritage of Chinese characters

context: There is a well-known investment philosophy, that is, "invest in a company with a moat".The general meaning is that a company can only resist the erosion of its own profit space by other competitors only if it has sufficient competitive advantages.Investors can only invest in such Only companies that can bring excess returns.However, "moats" often have traps, and the most common trap is market share.Higher market shares are often considered by investors as the company's "moat", but the practice has proven that this does not Unreliable.Market share just shows the company's past performance and does not represent the future.If there is not enough capacity to withstand foreign invasions, companies will have to maintain market share through price wars, and the result must be a significant decline in profit margins.
Answer: A.Understanding competitive advantage as one-sided

context: In the process of urbanization in some areas, due to the excessive development of labor-intensive and private enterprises, urban economic construction has strongly depended on the floating population.Although the floating population has brought vitality and vitality to cities, it has increased fiscal and taxation.Income, but because their cultural level is generally low and their overall quality is not high, it has created an amazing number of small merchants and hawkers and huge "migrant workers" teams.With the continuous upgrading of industries in these regions, the demand for simple labor will inevitably increase.With less and less, the floating population will face the danger of unemployment, which will inevitably cause more serious problems, which will hinder the process of urbanization in these areas.
Answer: A.The increase in the floating population has a negative effect on urbanization development in some areas

context: After ten years of success and failure, we have a correct understanding of "focusing on economic construction" and have found a way to promote reform and opening up.Everyone knows that this understanding and this road are not easy to come by.We must double our cherished, and we must not waver at any time.However, from the first day of reform and opening up, we attach great importance to the construction of spiritual civilization while attaching great importance to economic construction.If only the former and the latter are not, there is no Chinese characteristic.socialism.
Answer: A."Economic construction as the center" is a hard-won correct understanding

context: The same words, from different people's mouths, sometimes have very different effects.In college classrooms, the same sentence, some teachers will win applause, and some teachers will cause a boo.The main reason is that the former has earned himself the right to speak with his actions, while the latter has not.It is obvious that what is important is often not what someone said, but who said it.

context: Literary and economic people have a very keen sense of smell, and their desire to discover good things is endless.They know the dynamics of the literary world, and their main job every day is to figure out what kind of works are selling well.To this end, they track all large newspapers With literary magazines, read tons of review articles, and personally interact with writers, editors, and other people in the publishing industry, get a variety of inside news this way.

context: During the rapid industrialization process after World War II, Japan's industrial water consumption peaked in 1973 and fell by 24% by 1989, while industrial output continued to grow steadily.The United States also followed this pattern, with the United States' industrial water consumption since 1950 It has fallen by 36% year-on-year, while industrial output has increased by 3.7 times.
Answer: A.Reduced water costs can expand output

context: The area of the United Kingdom is not large, but if the dialects of English in the British mainland are subdivided, there are more than 300 kinds of statistics.The area of the United States is much larger than that of the British mainland, but in the United States, the dialects of the English dialect are much smaller than the British mainland.American English dialects can be roughly divided into three types: Eastern, Midwestern, and Southern.Eastern dialects are distributed in the northeast region with Boston as the center; Midwestern dialects extend from the central region to the western region, and southern dialects are distributed from Virginia to Southeastern Texas.
Answer: A.The dialect distribution of English in the United States is less regular than in the United Kingdom

context: You and I are friends, and each exchanges an apple for each other.After the exchange, there is still an apple each; if you have one kind of thought, I also have one kind of thought, and friends exchange ideas, then each of us has two kinds of thoughts.

context: Nowadays, biotechnology is causing a new revolution in the field of medicine and health, and people are looking forward to using biotechnology to produce effective therapeutic drugs.Some biologically active substances with specific therapeutic effects, such as enzymes, hormones, vaccines, interferons, immunoglobulins, Interleukins, growth factors, etc., traditional production processes are mainly extracted from animal organs, blood and urine.Due to limited resources and minimal content, it is difficult and expensive to use a high-purity separation process.Biological genetic engineering methods to produce these drugs can solve these problems well.
Answer: A.Limited resources and minimal content

context: Some people say that learning classical Chinese texts is helpful to students' writing, not only does it not have a bad effect, and it will not be "non-literal".It is very good: it is very interesting to embellish a few classical Chinese words and apply some classical Chinese syntax.This unpleasant taste, although it is not so clear.Of course, I do not deny that studying classical Chinese is helpful to the writing of vernacular to a certain extent, and it helps to express in two aspects: chapter and language.This can also be said to be a modern writer A criticism.Why can't these be learned from modern works, but also go to the old ancestors to rescue soldiers?
Answer: A.Modern writers should be criticized because they abuse classical words and have a bad influence

context: The aurora is regarded as one of the most beautiful wonders in nature.If we ride a spaceship over the north and south poles of the earth and look at the earth from distant space, we will see a glittering halo around the earth's magnetic poles, this The rings are called aurora eggs.Because the side facing the sun is a bit squashed, while the side facing the sun is slightly stretched, it assumes the shape of an egg.The aurora eggs are in continuous change, when tomorrow Dark, sometimes stretching toward the equator, and sometimes shrinking toward the poles.The halo at midnight appears the widest and brightest.Long-term observation statistics show that the most frequent places of the aurora are two near the north and south magnetic latitudes of 67 degrees The aurora zone is called the South Aurora area and the Northern Lights area.Aurora activity occurs almost every day in the aurora area.In the inner area surrounded by the aurora eggs, it is usually called the aurora cover area.Instead, there are fewer opportunities than lower-latitude aurora.In the middle and low latitudes, especially near the equator, aurora rarely occurs.
Answer: A.The "Aurora cover area" is surrounded by "Aurora eggs", and the "Aurora borealis area" is distributed south of the northern "Aurora cover area"

context: The task of history is to make people understand the causal relationship inherent in the historical process through the retrospection of the elapsed years and the correct disclosure of historical laws, so as to gain wisdom and better connect the past and the future.
Answer: A.History accomplishes its task by revealing the laws of history

context: The researchers managed to immobilize the pollen protein on the wall of the test tube, first inject antibodies (IgG4) to bind it to the pollen protein; wash away excess IgG4, then add mite protein labeled with radioactive iodine, and finally rinse with water.The radiolabeled mite protein was found to stick to the wall of the test tube, meaning that the antibody bound two different antigens.
Answer: A.Pollen protein is fixed on the wall of the test tube, which helps stabilize its binding to IgG4

context: Whether in Wenzhou City, or in Qiaotou, Baixiang Town, you always feel an unusually strong atmosphere and vitality surrounding you.This is the unique commodity economic atmosphere and vitality in Wenzhou.In Wenzhou urban and rural, you see thousands of families Millions of households are engaged in commodity management, with workshops, workshops, professional markets, free markets, and retail stalls everywhere, large and small commodities everywhere, and a wide range of new products.Millions of Wenzhou people are not busy producing, It is just busy selling.In ancient times, there was a famous painting called Qingming Shanghe Tu, and the picture displayed by Wenzhou's commodity economy was the modern Qingming Shanghe Tu, and it was hundreds of times more prosperous than ancient paintings.
