Answer: A.The human environment is as good as the natural scenery

context: 2016 is a year full of extreme conditions in the global climate.The average concentration of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere has exceeded the warning line of 400ppm (1ppm is one millionth), methane concentrations have also soared to a record, and long-term indicators of climate change have risen to new levels.The sea ice area in Antarctica and the Arctic region has been severely reduced, breaking the lowest record.Russia, the Arctic region is 6 㠃 higher than the long-term average temperature.-7 㠃.Greenland glaciers begin to melt earlier and faster, and the Arctic is warming at twice the global average.
Answer: A.Global climate change was the most extreme in 2016

context: Compared with digital probability, word probability has ambiguity, non-probability and semantic characteristics.Digital probability is a more accurate way of expressing risk, which can be more objectively transmitted, explained, and used by people during risk communication.Probability and digital probability have different appearances in the history of evolution, and they belong to different development fields (language and mathematics), so the differences in their characteristics may not be limited to the above.For example, the non-probability calculation of written probability indicates that people communicate or When receiving the information represented by text probability, it will not be calculated cautiously in accordance with the rules of probability.The text probability will cause more intuitive thinking, and the digital probability will cause more analytical thinking.
Answer: A.Text probability is different from the numerical probability

context: Saturn's halo system is the closest thing we have to the dust and gravel disks that gave birth to Earth and other planets 4.55 billion years ago.This protoplanetary disk is formed by a nebula composed of ultra-low temperature gas and dust acting on its own gravity.As the rotating nebula gradually shrinks, it becomes a disk around the nascent sun.Once the gas has been blown away by the sun, the orbital debris in the disk is very similar to Saturn's halo system.
Answer: A.Shape

context: Poverty is sometimes not only a low income, but also a lack of ability.The essence of ability is quality.Civilization is also a quality, but also a more important quality.Researchers of "poor culture" have long proposed that not only should we pay attention to the living conditions of the poor, but also We must pay attention to their values, attitudes and behavior patterns.Once this "subculture" is formed, it will affect them to change the situation of poverty, and it will be passed down from generation to generation to maintain poverty.Mr.Yan Yangchu, the pioneer of the rural construction movement of the Republic of China It is determined that the fundamental strategy of rural construction is to manage "stupid, poor, weak, private" in order to cultivate the knowledge, productivity, strong building and solidarity of farmers.
Answer: A.The improvement of national quality lies in the development of civilization

context: With the development and transformation of the eastern coastal areas, the transfer of industries, and the economic rise of the central and western regions, traditional labor exporting places such as Chongqing, Hunan, and Sichuan are ushering in a wave of returning hometown entrepreneurs.Among these entrepreneurs, there are already returning rural migrant workers.Enterprise managers, also college students, company employees, etc., with strong nostalgia, seize the great opportunity for hometown development, and return home with capital, technology and advanced management concepts.In some parts of the Midwest, they return home The number of start-up companies and the output value created have already occupied half of the county's economy.At present, this trend is in the ascendant, it has brought a strong impetus to urbanization and industrialization in the central and western regions, and it has also changed China's economic landscape.
Answer: A.Midwest returnees to start their own businesses benefit mainly from the development and transformation of the east

context: Scientific quality is the prerequisite for citizens to achieve a good life, and it is the social foundation for implementing an innovation-driven development strategy and building a well-off society in an all-round way.At present, the scientific quality of our citizens does not meet the needs of national construction and social development.Studies show that those who enter the ranks of innovative countries In more than 30 developed countries, the proportion of citizens with the scientific quality is the lowest, and China is only 6.2%.Although the scientific quality of our citizens has improved rapidly, the development is uneven, and the gap with the developed countries in the world is still very large, especially in China.Public services in science popularization are very uneven, and farmers, new urban residents, and people in remote and minority areas have significantly fewer opportunities to access services.
Answer: A.The scientific quality of our citizens needs to be further improved

context: Culture has inherently unpredictable power, which not only makes people cling to tradition, but also encourages people to accept new possibilities.Just like the Spring Festival reunion, returning to hometown is certainly an excellent way, but the Spring Festival cannot be separated from the post, and returning to the wrong peak I still have a strong feeling.If I choose a third place to travel for the holiday, why is it another kind of joy? The environment of the times has changed, and the cultural form will also change accordingly.Some forms of the past that represent "nianweier" may leave us.Go away, but as long as the heart is together, you can find a new "nianweier" and replace it without leaving an emotional or cultural gap.
Answer: A.The importance of the Spring Festival has changed for Chinese people

context: The reform has entered a stage of deep interest adjustment and power reconstruction, with increasing resistance.However, no matter how hard the bones are, the deeper the river will be.The core of government reform is to simplify administration and decentralize power, and change functions.The Central Government has made three orders and implemented the list system.The efforts have been modest, but the results have been difficult to satisfy the people.In many places and departments, it is difficult to put power in place and the environment in which it is difficult to manage.So many "double innovation" "Behavior is subject to the suspension of policy, so many companies are not fighting the battlefield, but falling into the" last mile "of administrative approval.
Answer: A.The deeper the reform, the greater the resistance encountered

context: Under the new normal, the "sharing economy" provides new ideas for economic structural adjustment and industrial structure transformation.In the information age, the logistics industry has a wide coverage, involving many parties, and the main players in the logistics market are small and scattered, with many operating links The heterogeneous characteristics, in particular, require companies, logistics companies and other parties to share information and resources, change the logistics operation model and organization model, comprehensively promote information and intelligence, and complete resource integration through a simple, efficient and complete platform.
Answer: A.The "sharing economy" model should be used mainly in the logistics industry

context: Culture is the soul of a country and a nation.History and reality have shown that a nation that has abandoned or betrayed its own history and culture is not only impossible to develop, but also likely to stage a series of historical tragedies.Cultural self-confidence is the foundation Broader and deeper self-confidence is a more basic, deeper and more durable force.Firm cultural self-confidence is a major issue related to the prosperity and decline of the country, cultural security, and national spiritual independence.Without cultural self-confidence, no It is possible to write works that have bones, personality, and charm.
Answer: A.The meaning of cultural self-confidence

context: When the development of an organization is slow, and internal problems occur, the company must change its management model.When external changes have little impact, the company can adjust the daily management details to adapt to the changes; and when small adjustments cannot adapt to changes, the company Management change needs to be considered.It should be noted that adaptive adjustment and management change may not be 100% successful, but without adjustment or change, the business of the enterprise will inevitably fail.
Answer: A.The sluggish development of a company often indicates a problem with the management of the company

context: It is important to protect the historical relics, but it is more indispensable to be in awe of the history that the ancestors have gone through.Not paying attention to the cultural bloodline behind the historical relics, forcibly demolishing and rebuilding is actually a display of contemporary culture.A way of power.Technically speaking, as long as there are drawings, maybe any kind of building can be reconstructed, but the history and culture carried on it are difficult to reproduce.Cultural heritage and history have its own footprint, It did not happen overnight.If you think that with a huge investment and a pile of building materials, you can connect with history and follow the context, I am afraid that cultural relics will become modern playthings.
Answer: A.Protecting cultural relics requires awe and respect for the history and culture behind it

context: "Economic financialization" has become the direct cause of the financial crisis.When a currency has the magic power to buy everything in the market, it becomes a symbol of wealth, making those who are more profitable and light-hearted fall into the quagmire of monetary fetishism, and the infinite pursuit of monetary wealth will Bring disasters to society.Today, economic globalization is more harmful and will quickly spread into a global crisis.To this end, we must attach importance to the governance and supervision of the financial industry.
Answer: A.Money is a symbol of wealth

context: The practical idea of reading is dissolving the most moving and interesting part of it.However, in these moving, interesting and "useless" knowledge and thoughts, young people can discover the lack of the soul, and the spirit is bathed in the long luster .Nowadays universities offer courses in classical literature, aesthetic theory, etc., with this intention.When knowledge comes out of dogmatic theory, it will become an existence with temperature.
Answer: A.Blindly pursuing practical ideas of reading can make reading dull and boring

context: Consolidating computational thinking is an important goal of each stage of education.Only in this way can students develop their ability on the basis of the previous level.Computational thinking helps solve problems in any field.For example, breaking down a large problem into several Small problems, feasibility paths for designing small experiments through reasoning, and co-designing solutions to problems with others.Adopting these strategies in different environments can make students understand that computational thinking is far more useful than computers.
Answer: A.Cultivating computational thinking is an important part of education

context: Different from the new urban development concept of developed countries, many cities in China are still obsessed with creating "garden cities".If "garden cities" are understood as flowers and trees, this is not good in itself.The problem is that there are many places It is wrong to understand the "garden city" as a low density and wide road, especially the blind pursuit of wide roads, large squares and large green belts in the construction of new cities.
Answer: A."Garden City" is an outdated concept of urban development

context: In the current world, devices are highly interconnected, and security and privacy are highly valued.In the future where the brain can be interconnected, these two issues will only become more critical.Mental safety researchers need to develop highly secure communication protocols to The risk of brain-brain communication is minimized.Policy makers also need to pass relevant laws to minimize the abuse of technology.Can the benefits of brain-brain communication overcome its risks? How will this technology change human evolution? Trajectory? Will society be better because of it? Perhaps it is time to discuss these issues.
Answer: A.The possible negative effects of brain-brain communication technology should be paid attention to

context: Simply put, the review is mainly for people in the circle, sometimes even for industry peers, so it is described entirely in pure professional language.But Yuanke's popular works are different, and its target is people outside the field.For this reason, it is necessary for the person who knows this industry to sort out the origin and background of knowledge, and even the painstaking experience and experience of scientific research.
Answer: A.The relationship between the review and the popular science

context: In recent years, researchers have developed an "artificial skin" that can mimic the characteristics of healthy young skin and is expected to become the "second layer of skin" for humans."Artificial skin" is a cross-blending of medicine, biology, chemistry, materials, engineering, etc.Many disciplines have finally achieved such results through continuous screening, optimization and clinical testing of materials.In reality, there are many similar results, such as the close cooperation between cardiac surgeons, electrical engineers and computer scientists.Using 3D printing to transform the scanned image of a patient's diseased heart into a physical model for cardiac surgery.Historically, no medical technology and medical device innovation were done by a clinician or a subject expert alone.Based on clinical issues Multidisciplinary cooperation can truly achieve independent innovation in the field of medical technology and medical devices.
Answer: A.Independent medical innovation promotes multidisciplinary cooperation

context: The high housing prices in first-tier cities and the pursuit of quality of life for young people after the 90s have led to the rise of rented apartments.Catering to the consumption concept of young people, rented apartments have changed from the last resort to a way to enjoy life.According to the survey, Although owning their own housing is still a rigid demand of the post-90s, only 30% of them are willing to reduce the quality of life in order to buy a house; another 56% are not willing to buy a house because the excessive mortgage will reduce the quality of life.In short, these post-90s who value more personal value may become the "non-buying house generation."
Answer: A.Many post-90s are unwilling to reduce the quality of life in order to buy a house

context: At present, the rise in seawater temperature has caused a series of bleaching events.Researchers are very worried about the fate of global corals.Researchers have found that zooxanthellae can use photosynthesis to produce the nutrients needed by itself and its hosts.When symbiotic algae called zooxanthellae, corals that lost colored algae gradually turned white, and bleaching occurred.If the bleaching continued, the only thing waiting for coral reefs would be death.
Answer: A.Limiting the rise in atmospheric temperature will at least give coral reefs some time to adapt

context: In recent years, the development of new energy vehicles in China has achieved staged results.The promotion and application of new energy vehicles across the country has steadily advanced.A complete industrial chain has been formed in China from raw material supply to vehicle manufacturing, and a certain industrial scale has been formed.In 2016, new energy vehicle companies with annual sales of more than 10,000 vehicles worldwide accounted for more than half of China's, far ahead of other countries.Clean energy vehicles have once again attracted attention.On the one hand, it is conducive to the continued promotion of the healthy and sustainable development of the new energy vehicle industry.It is conducive to the promotion of common hybrid power, natural gas, methanol and other clean energy sources, and the co-existence of multiple technological routes, which is conducive to promoting the transition and upgrading of China's automotive industry to a low-carbon, clean.
Answer: A.China has a bright future for clean energy vehicles, and it is already a world leader

context: In recent years, with the rapid development of social media such as Weibo and WeChat, rumors about food have been rumbling, which has caused great disturbance to people's daily life.At the China Food Rumor Forum held recently, intelligent warning processing of Chinese food rumors The platform is officially launched, and high hopes are given to crack the status quo of food rumors.Complete and improve the platform and mechanism for food safety reporting, and integrate the reporting mechanism into the intelligent early warning processing platform for food rumors, so that closed-loop management of food rumor management can truly establish consumption.Confidence in food safety.
Answer: A.Rumors about food are raging, and rumor warning platforms have emerged as the times require.

context: A British study found that chewing can activate an oral immune cell called Th17, which protects the mouth from common bacterial and fungal infections.Researchers fed mice with harder food in the laboratory.Increasing the number of times they chewed when they ate, which successfully led to an increase in the number of Th17 immune cells in mice, demonstrating the effect of chewing on activating the relevant immune system.Unlike immune cells in the skin, intestine and other parts, The activation mechanism is relatively unique.It is not activated by the appearance of bacteria, but by chewing behavior, which triggers an immune response in the gums.
Answer: A.The unique mechanism of Th17 immune cell activation is that it is activated by chewing

context: Today, we are already living in the information age.The database we have is becoming more and more comprehensive.It is no longer just a little bit of poor data at hand, but includes a large amount or even all of the data related to these phenomena.We no longer need So worrying about the negative impact of a particular stronghold on the entire analysis.What we have to do is accept and benefit from this plethora of data, instead of eliminating all uncertainty at a high cost.
Answer: A.All data information is inevitably uncertain

context: Speaking of the impact of ocean acidification, treasure crabs worth about 2.2 dollars a year in fisheries may be affected by the reduction of their own food sources and will face a strong downturn in the next 50 years.But pteropods, copepods, are vulnerable to acidification Damaged tiny sea creatures with shells may experience a slight decline because they are abundant enough to withstand most of the effects.At the same time, marine mammals and sea birds are less affected by ocean acidification.
Answer: A.The market outlook for treasure crab is dim

context: Although remakes are easier than re-creating or "starting another stove", you can't ignore the quality of the script because of remakes.Huddle making is even more impractical.Creation is the first priority and the basis for remake success.If it fails, it is not only the audience that is lost, but also the collapse of the original successful image and the devaluation of the brand.
Answer: A.It's not necessarily easier than "new shoot"

context: A daze corresponds to thoughts.When a person is in a daze, there are no thoughts in his mind.It is a feeling of living in the present and immersed in reality.The thoughts focus on the past and the future.Too many thoughts, people will Gradually lose their connection with the real world and fall into all kinds of emotions.At this time, you need to cut off the power at the right time, turn off your thoughts, draw your attention back to reality, and reconnect with this real world.
Answer: A.Thoughts are cranky, daze is the focus on the present

context: Spiritual poverty is more terrible than physical poverty.Some poor areas and poor villages cannot help for many years, help but not rich, help but not strong, and lack of poor thinks of change, and poor think of diligence.There is a certain relationship between the spirit of struggle.Some places take the initiative to "return to poverty".They are happy to be in poverty-stricken counties and are unwilling to take off poverty.Some poor households are not active in developing agricultural and sideline industries."Poverty" and "spirit and poverty"."Hard work is worse than suffering" and "waiting for others to send a well-off".Similar ideas can be said to be a stumbling block and a stumbling block to the road of poverty alleviation.Attitude drip irrigation and targeted therapy.
Answer: A.Broad Poverty Alleviation

context: Human height is one of the biological traits.People have always thought that height is mainly determined by a combination of genetic, diet and environmental factors.However, after humans have recognized the role of genes, they have begun to think that genes play a major role in determining the height.So after the completion of the human genome project, it began to search for genes related to height and obtain its information and knowledge related to health, disease and so on.
Answer: A.The difference in height is in appearance and the difference in health status is also large.

context: The traditional view of understanding the working mechanism of visual perception goes back to the 16th century French philosopher Descartes.Descartes believes that the brain first constructs a mirror model of the external world, and then in the brain, we observe this like watching a movie According to this view, inverted glasses cause the internal mirror model to be inverted, and the brain generates visual perception based on this inverted mirror.However, more and more people are beginning to question this interpretation, and Degener is one of them.The visual phenomenon he experienced on the 30th day of the experiment led him to the opposite of Cartesian mirror theory.
Answer: A.How visual perception works

context: Hold the fingerprint on the screen, this is mainly because the thickness of the screen module itself causes the sensor to not collect enough useful signals.This makes the front capacitive fingerprint recognition scheme useless on full-screen mobile phones.The screen, literally explained, is that the front of the phone is all screens, adopting a bezel-less design, and pursuing a screen ratio of close to 100%.However, due to the current technology, the full-screen phone claimed by the industry is only a super high screen Compared with mobile phones.If you want to make the full screen more "full" or even close to the real "full screen", the fingerprint recognition under the screen must be overcome.There are two main known fingerprint recognition schemes under the screen: One is the use of OLED to achieve, that is, optical identification; the other is ultrasonic fingerprint recognition
Answer: A.At present, there are no mobile phones with a screen ratio of 100% on the market.

context: Studies have found that organic carbon, elemental carbon, L-glucan, galactan, mannan, p-hydroxybenzoic acid, vanillic acid, syringic acid and dehydroabietic acid all show high values in autumn in Lumbini.The lowest in summer.The content of L-glucan in this region is comparable to the concentration level in areas affected by biomass burning in South Asia, which indicates that biomass burning has an important impact on the atmospheric environment in Lumbini.The organic carbon, elemental carbon and L-glucan have a significant correlation, indicating that biomass combustion is the main source of high-concentration carbonaceous components in the region.The results of the ratio of L-glucan / mannan and vanillic acid / syringic acid shows that the types of biomass burning in the area are mainly crop residues and hardwood burning.
Answer: A.More crop residues and hardwoods in Lumbini

context: Lithium-ion battery is a very important energy storage technology, which is widely used in portable electronic devices and new energy vehicles.With the advent of the era of electric vehicles and smart grids, the large-scale development of lithium-ion batteries is limited by the bottleneck of lithium resource shortage.Compared with lithium, sodium reserves are abundant, widely distributed, low cost, and have similar physical and chemical properties to lithium, so the research of sodium ion batteries has once again received extensive attention from the scientific and industrial circles.Compared with lithium ion batteries, sodium The energy density of ion batteries is usually low.Although it is not suitable for applications in the field of portable electronic equipment and electric vehicles with high energy density requirements, it is suitable for low-speed electric vehicles that are not too energy-intensive and cost-sensitive.And communication base stations, home energy storage and other fields.
Answer: A.In terms of economic benefits, sodium ion batteries are more affordable than lithium ion batteries

context: Although China's science popularization work has made great progress, there is still an order of magnitude gap between developed countries and developed countries in terms of quantity and quality.On some major issues of social concern, scientists should take the initiative to speak out.We must transform scientific language For the people to understand the language, tell the truth truthfully.If even scientists are unwilling to speak, let the truth be missing, and rumors spread, it will inevitably cause public panic and confusion.
Answer: A.Popular science work should be popular and grounded

context: The science of the 17th century was empiricist science.At that time, it was generally believed that human beings could use the senses to collect as much data as possible and finally understand the entire world through this data.Based on this, scientific discoveries were accidental and widely accepted.Scientific development and the use of new scientific instruments have increased the amount of scientific research data to a geometric progression.This situation has made previous experience no longer applicable-humans can no longer process and master these data by the senses alone.At the same time, the way to explore and mine data can even allow scientists to "plan contingency."
Answer: A.Limitations of empirical science

context: According to Marshall's definition, consumer surplus refers to the net income obtained by consumers through commodity exchange.Specifically, it is the difference between the consumer's willingness to purchase a product and the actual transaction price.This means that the size of consumer surplus It depends on two factors: the buyer's willing price and the actual transaction price.We know that the actual transaction price is the market price.No single buyer or seller can control the market price.It depends on the market.If the transaction price is the market price, the consumer's remaining size It depends on the buyer's willing price.The higher the buyer's willing price, the greater the consumer surplus.
Answer: A.Consumer surplus is affected by seller pricing behavior

context: The sharing economy is an economy in which ownership and use rights are separated.It integrates a large number of fragmented resources through Internet technology to achieve maximum supply and demand matching in the entire society.On the one hand, a large number of idle resources in the hands of individuals and enterprises It can be fully used through the sharing economy, thereby reducing waste of resources.On the other hand, the existing overcapacity and the main reason for product backlogs are that production companies cannot understand demand in a timely manner, and the sharing economy can use big data to solve information problems.The problem of symmetry is to achieve on-demand production and achieve efficient allocation and efficient use of resources.These can alleviate the excessive consumption of resources to a certain extent, thereby reducing pollutant emissions and effectively reducing the probability of environmental pollution.
Answer: A.The allocation of resources is closely related to environmental issues

context: In general, there are several characteristic nodes in the development of an industry.When a new technology is born, there will be an intensive product release period.During this period, it will experience rapid technology and product iterations and rapid price changes.In the digital field, the discontinuation or iteration of many products is mostly related to the consumer habits and desire to pursue new things.For example, as the camera function of smartphones becomes more mature and the pixels are higher, the entire digital camera industry begins Transformation and take a professional high-end line.
Answer: A.Factors Affecting Technology and Product Iteration

context: Although the speed of driverless technology updates is overwhelming for the general public, so far, no company has launched a complete and mature product, and most companies are still stuck in the driverless test link.For a new technology, testing The closer the real environment is, the more accurate the results will be.But cars are different from other products.Once an accident occurs, public safety will be endangered.Therefore, driverless towns were born based on this demand.Currently, Shanghai, Zhejiang , Beijing and other places are rushing to build unmanned towns, and the enthusiasm of local governments for this has greatly promoted the further development of unmanned research.Technology is important, but it is obviously not in the future unmanned field The only decisive link.
Answer: A.Technology is not the only determinant of its development

context: Technological innovation can bring about a change in reading methods.The invention of printing has made reading more popular and convenient, and the development of electronic technology has created a new form of books and periodicals, giving birth to a free reading method of "anytime, anywhere, anytime." With the pressure of work and life, people can spend less and less time concentrating on reading.Micro-reading using fragmented time solves this problem to a certain extent.
Answer: A.Technology advances the evolution of reading styles

context: Looking back at the Chinese nation, because there are those shining poems and poems, the long dynasty changes will no longer be monotonous, and the Chinese civilization will become more and more brilliant.Today we are talking about protecting the environment and building an ecological civilization.Feel the beauty, cultivate and improve the aesthetic ability.Needless to say, poetry has become increasingly niche, and those who can deeply understand it, not in the majority, cannot be forced.But through popular packaging, more people can get closer to nature through poetry and feel It is undoubtedly a positive energy thing to change, experience the rhythm of life, and thus appreciate the beauty of nature.
Answer: A.The Chinese nation has a tradition of loving poetry and loving nature

context: Once a country has stepped on the development ladder, the demands of citizens will increase.At this time, the government only guarantees that it is not enough to increase income.The government must change its mindset from material-based to regulatory-based.Studies targeting Asia Pacific countries have found Citizens' satisfaction with the public service-related projects they receive, such as education, health care, and public safety, plays an important role in their evaluation of government performance.In recent years, Asian countries have increasingly paid more attention to public service satisfaction.Improve, and formed some distinctive practices.
Answer: A.Reasons for attaching importance to public service satisfaction

context: Smart cities use information and communication technology to sense, analyze, and integrate key information of the core system of urban operation to realize smart management and operation of the city, thereby meeting various needs including people's livelihood, environmental protection, public safety, and industrial and commercial activities Make intelligent responses to create a better life for the people in the city and promote the sustainable growth of the city.According to statistics, as of now, more than 500 cities in China have made a total of about 500 Or is building a smart city, which accounts for about half of the total number of smart cities created in the world.
Answer: A.Essential conditions for building a smart city

context: In the past, our peasant image formation has formed two habitual models: one is to positively tell how the protagonist uses the methods of tolerance and humiliation, self-sacrifice or good character to win the enemy and win in binary oppositions such as reform and conservative or advanced and backward The villagers trust and make progress in reform; the other is to resolve the contradictions and maintain the appeal to the audience through a series of skit or comedy stories of the hero.The aesthetic consequence of these two habitual models is that the image of the peasant has almost become Invariable symbols, lack of due richness and attractiveness, and a huge gap with real life.This model is a flattening of the reality itself.
Answer: A.What are the disadvantages of a single description of the peasant image?

context: Today, young parents of the new generation generally have received comprehensive higher education, and some have experience studying and living overseas, and have their own understanding and requirements for their children's enlightenment education.Imported cartoons, whether in narrative style or performance In terms of methods, they are closer to their aesthetic standards.At the same time, children's understanding ability is also rising, and they can observe and understand the world earlier.In fact, the domestic animation resources are not without them, such as the reason for "Journey to the West" It has become a classic, has been adapted many times, and has been popular all the time, because its myth system is a projection of reality.The key question is whether domestic producers have the ability to think deeply and dig into reality.
Answer: A.Depression in domestic animation stems from poor producers

context: Anyone who knows the process of making banknotes knows that the banknotes everywhere have an art-like production process.First, artists need to design artwork, or hand-painted or cut and paste, and these manuscripts need to be reviewed in detail by the relevant departments before they are approved.The paper selection work is also very sophisticated.The most basic characteristics of paper are to wear resistance, folding resistance, corrosion resistance, acid and alkali resistance, etc.Anti-counterfeiting technology is also the focus of banknotes.This requires a lot of high-tech, security lines, and color lines.The perfect fusion of technologies such as blue fiber can distinguish it from counterfeit banknotes to the greatest extent.In addition, figures, flowers, and other patterns need to be artistic, because coins represent the image of a country, at least make people look comfortable and have both.The potential of "collection".
Answer: A.The process of making banknotes is tedious and complicated

context: Copyright protection in the Internet era requires more flexible and inclusive policies and measures, while protecting the interests of creators and copyright owners, it also reserves space for the Internet's open and shared endogenous power.In fact, pirated books were produced and sold offline from the early days., CDs and audio cassettes, today with a click of a mouse and typing on the keyboard, you can easily copy the intellectual achievements of others, which has long been a problem of copyright infringement.Some media platforms with large numbers of users automatically reprint others' news works without authorization In the Internet age, how to prevent the embarrassment of "I work hard to grow grass and you free sheep" without hindering the spirit of the open and shared Internet, how to resolve the new type of communication characterized by interactive communication and the existing copyright system.Conflict, which requires more flexible and inclusive policy measures.
Answer: A.The grim situation of online copyright protection

context: When talking about the history of human art, people tend to value language, especially as the language of the text.Because people are used to thinking that vision is intuitive, specific and emotional, lacking deep and complicated meanings.But from a historical perspective, People are creating and touching images before using and understanding the text, and the history of the relationship between humans and images is far longer than that of humans and texts.The expression and communication of images not only have a long history, but people often find that many At that time, the experience and interpretation of visual art was as difficult as grasping the language and writing, and even more complicated.
Answer: A.Lack of awareness of the importance of images in art history

context: The 1960 U.S.presidential election was the first campaign to be shown on television.The television debate highlighted Nixon's disadvantages and allowed Kennedy to make a comeback.In the reverse process of U.S.urbanization (i.e., suburbanization), the panicked middle class and workers The class wants the country to change, and this mentality of change also makes Kennedy a beneficiary.The result of the election has pushed the civil rights movement to a climax, slowing the process of the conservative right-led dominating political agenda in the United States, and cutting-edge science, public facilities and society funded by the government The welfare industry has continued its rapid development for more than ten years, bringing by-products such as revolutionary new technologies such as personal computers and the Internet.
Answer: A.The decisive role of the media in the US election

context: Indian film used to be synonymous with the dull and lengthy stage play.The mode is the same, the story is old-fashioned, and the characters are typed.Mumbai's "Bollywood" also makes people think it is a fake with a strong color, because it mimics the name of "Hollywood".The production base of dramas.However, after undergoing genre films such as song and dance films, superhero films, and romantic films, Indian films have a production volume of more than 1,900 a year, which makes its film industry show a spectacular weather against the Hollywood Chamber.Especially recently For more than a decade, Indian filmmakers have been a godsend to build a bridge between reality and illusion.Therefore, their ability to tell stories in this world's largest film market has been increasingly enhanced, and they have spoken wonderfully.story.
Answer: A.The most prominent feature of Indian film is good storytelling

context: On a positive level, overconsumption is a sign of the improvement of people's material living standards and the improvement of consumption capacity.At the same time, people's consumption concepts are also constantly upgrading, which objectively has also led to a faster increase in the rate of product replacement., And the prominent waste phenomenon.But the more fundamental reason is that the context of the consumer society has always encouraged people's consumer behavior by giving new meaning to goods and consumption.
Answer: A.Excessive consumption cannot be controlled

context: When the cohesion of group members is high, group members tend to keep their views consistent with the group, while other controversial, creative and even more objective and reasonable ideas will be ignored or suppressed.This may cause the group to make unreasonable Even bad decision-making.Similar phenomena may appear in the process of public opinion on the Internet.People are more likely to be attracted to the forum where they agree and continue to deepen their original views.This may cause group fans Thinking, the formation of incorrect but dominant opinions favored by the majority, and the situation where dissidents are "represented" and hold a speech.
Answer: A.Internet public opinion may not be able to represent the true thoughts of Internet users, and the government should discriminate against this when seeking public opinion

context: At present, the reform of the examination and admission system in China is in full swing.It is hoped that the reform of the basic education stage will be promoted through the reform of the college entrance examination and encourage middle schools to adjust the education direction from "simple education" to "full education" and from the pursuit of academic results to promoting students At the same time, through comprehensive quality evaluation to encourage personalized education in middle schools, guide students to self-awareness, find their own expertise and personality.Conversely, if the mid-term entrance examination program continues to expand, it may not only affect education reform at this stage.Quality may also offset the results of the college entrance examination reform.
Answer: A.It is the general trend of education reform to implement weight-loss reform for extra points in the middle school entrance examination.

context: The map is originally a thing, it should not be people, and it cannot be people.If there are people on the map, it is not a map, but a picture.This sentence should be a theorem in the strict sense, but some travel maps are encountered.I m afraid that I have to make a turn-tourism often has both scenery and characters.This is like Taishan, the Terracotta Army in the tourist map must say Qin Shihuang, the Ming Tombs must refer to the Ming Emperor, the Summer Palace tour The picture must say the same as Empress Dowager Cixi, because many scenes in that environment begin with human activities and add aesthetic value because of human activities.
Answer: A.A map with people is not a real map

context: At present, publicity has become a museum and one of the most important properties of art museums.A large exhibition can create a grand event that breaks the threshold and is empty.This is the most convenient way for modern people to have a relationship with art.If there are still people today Continuing the gurgling water, watching the poetry and painting, and widely advertising it as a show off, it is inevitable that the people will be regarded as "too outfit", and eventually fall into an arty laugh.
Answer: A.Aesthetic methods need to keep pace with the times

context: The change in reading scenes has triggered a major change in the field of knowledge: traditional knowledge carriers, pushpins on books have been pried open by the network, and knowledge information has floated into a fragmented existence.The network has amplified these pieces of information, which in turn Changed people's reading mentality.In other words, in the face of massive amounts of information, people's information anxiety is also more serious, time is not enough, and attention is not enough, the information read is like sand in the hand, and I ca nt remember it.The lack of binding tools and binding methods for mass information is the root of what many people call a "reading crisis."
Answer: A.The "reading crisis" is caused by massive information

context: Today, under the upright anti-corruption, some cadres lament that they are uncomfortable and not free.In a certain sense, this kind of psychology is inseparable from their views on freedom.As Marx said, the code is the Bible of people's freedom.The reason is easy to understand, but in the subconscious and intuitive feelings, some people still regard freedom as unrestricted, unrestricted, or less restricted, and rarely restricted.The problem is that unrestricted freedom is necessarily distorted and unreal.It can only be left in imagination.Whoever really treats liberty so freely, without resentment, and who does not know awe, will eventually pay a heavy price.
Answer: A.Self-discipline is the premise and guarantee, and freedom is the purpose and dependence

context: If China wants to do much in the 21st century, it should never work only on the general skills of international competition and interaction.It is more important to recognize the evolution and development of the world's political characteristics in a timely manner, thereby inspiring a larger Strategic wisdom, keen insight into possible future trends in the world, timely elimination of its own disadvantages that are not suitable for future development, safeguarding the security and interests of the country, and seeking the comprehensive development of society.In other words, the mission of international strategy is not and cannot be for the world.Design some sort of self-righteous ending.
Answer: A.China's international strategy should recognize the evolution and development trend of world political characteristics

context: At present, there are still a large number of bricklayers, rebar workers, boiler workers, painters and other types of workers in China's blue-collar jobs.Due to the influence of professional "discipline", only relevant ones can be found in the professional directory of secondary vocational education in China.Professional names with a strong "discipline", and these professional names make it difficult for students to associate future corresponding employment positions with the above-mentioned blue-collar positions, resulting in "discounts" for graduates who truly enter the above-mentioned blue-collar positions.
Answer: A.The professional catalog of secondary vocational education in China needs to be adjusted according to actual job needs

context: At present, Internet technology is developing rapidly, and at the same time as technological progress, new security loopholes are constantly being created.It is often the power of the government to maintain information security.The frontier technologies of Internet security are mostly in the hands of enterprises and need to be updated.Mobilize more social forces and give play to the role of enterprises and the market.Through market incentives, you can also mobilize "white hat" cyber security volunteers to actively discover and report cyber security vulnerabilities.
Answer: A.Whether it is good at protecting the personal information of citizens, not only reflects the national idea, but also involves national interests

context: In recent years, Guangzhou's economy is undergoing a profound transformation.Prior to this, Guangzhou, as an important global business center, was more focused on gathering goods and people around the world.Now Guangzhou is building a hub-type network city to bring together more important cities.Capital and intellectual (technical) elements to form a global high-end factor allocation hub.At the same time, Guangzhou's industrial structure has also accelerated its optimization.On the basis of the original automobile, daily chemical and other advantageous industries, it represents the "both ends" of the future industry direction.Industries-"terminal industries" and "high-end industries" are being introduced into Guangzhou and achieving clustered development, thus complementing the city's long-standing industry shortcomings.
Answer: A.Guangzhou's self-reform in line with the global industry trend

context: The enforcement effect of the law is largely determined by the attitude of the public and law enforcers to illegal behavior.The prohibition on the display of fireworks and firecrackers is inconsistent with the Chinese custom of "firecrackers should be set off on New Year's and festive occasions".In most cases, In the minds of Chinese people, setting off fireworks and firecrackers is an important sign of "resigning the old and welcoming the new" and "lively and lively for the New Year." Even in the consciousness of many people, there will be "how can we count the New Year without setting off firecrackers?" So many people see others setting off firecrackers and lighting fireworks in violation of laws and regulations, not only do not despise him, but also feel very happy and optimistic, which virtually weakens the effect of execution punishment.
Answer: A.Enforcement of laws will not be effective when laws and social customs are inconsistent

context: In ancient Roman times, in order to ensure the fairness of the trial of judges, judges often did not actively collect or investigate evidence, but only used the evidence submitted by both parties to determine the facts of the case during the trial of the case.Before the trial of the case, the judge Knowing the facts of a case is often unaware of it, which helps to prevent judges from forming unreasonable preconceptions about the facts of the case and avoid prejudice.
Answer: A.Fairness is the number one factor in a judge's trial

context: In all fairness, leisure has been a luxury since ancient times.It depends on the two most difficult prerequisites for ordinary people: material abundance or at least self-sufficient freedom of survival, sufficient spare time, and maybe even relying on nothing to find things To pass the freedom of time.Based on these two prerequisites, supplemented by specific spiritual needs, whether such needs come from piety such as religious inspiration, pure curiosity, or nobleness in order to meet fashion Decent and upbringing, at least in the seventeenth century known as the "scientific rise" or "scientific revolution", science was just a "porcelain job" that few people could afford.
Answer: A.The requirements of leisure and spiritual needs make science difficult to popularize at a particular age

context: For infants with cerebral palsy, crawling is difficult.These children have damaged brains and have less control over their muscles, so they often cannot crawl on the ground.Correspondingly, motor skills and spatial positioning are related.The development of neural connections will also be stagnated, which will cause patients to experience more sports-related problems in the future.Some research teams have developed a new device designed to help infants crawl.With the help of machines, Corresponding nerves in infants with suspected cerebral palsy are exercised to learn to crawl earlier and further.
Answer: A.Cerebral palsy infants have difficulty crawling

context: New technologies often collide with our psychological and cognitive comfort zone with their unique unknown, forward-looking.People are afraid that the development of big data will make them be controlled or replaced in the future.Such concerns cannot be said to be redundant.According to statistics, 90% of the EU's current jobs require people to have some digital skills, and 65% of the new school children in the EU will grow up to engage in occupations that do not currently exist.However, this "new technology" is still in its youth, such as Humans, like themselves, are complex polyhedrons, so observation also requires richer, more diverse perspectives.
Answer: A.It is difficult to work in the EU without some digital skills

context: The meat paradox refers to the fact that some people like to eat meat, but cannot think of the scene in which the animal providing the meat dies.Researchers have found that people use a method called "language camouflage" to let sentient beings and potential The connection between food sources has become more obscure in order to eliminate this cognitive dissonance.For example, when we refer to meat, we don't say the name of the animal directly.In English, pork is called pork, beef is called B.eef, or It s called bacon.In 18th century Japan, because the shogunate banned people from eating animal meat at that time, people who stole meat used plant names to refer to meat, called horse meat as cherry meat, venison as red leaves, Wild pork is called peony.
Answer: A."Language camouflage" is a manifestation of human deception

context: Although "new retail" has become the hottest concept at the moment, there is actually no accurate definition of what is new retail.The professional saying is "reconstruction of people, goods, and the Internet and big data", popularly The understanding is probably the combination of online and offline, and then supplemented by technical means such as artificial intelligence, big data, cloud computing, etc., to achieve a comprehensive upgrade of the traditional retail industry's production and sales.
Answer: A.The emergence of new technologies such as artificial intelligence is a necessary condition for new retail

context: Typhoon is a severe and destructive weather, so forecasting and forecasting typhoons has always been an important task in meteorological work.There are many methods for forecasting and forecasting typhoons, but in order to more accurately grasp its generation, development and The traveling route has long been hoped by meteorologists to be able to go deep into the typhoon center to detect it.The purpose of doing this is to more accurately determine the center position of the typhoon; the second is to put a "falling instrument" falling in the eyes of the typhoon.The down gauge can measure the temperature, humidity, and pressure at various altitudes within the eye of the typhoon; the third is to measure the weather conditions such as clouds and weather, wind direction, wind speed, strong wind radius, and degree of bumps, and use a radio automatic transmitter to send to the weather station on the ground The report provides first-hand data for the analysis and forecast of the typhoon's future dynamics by local meteorological stations.
Answer: A.Importance of forecasting and forecasting typhoons

context: According to reports, the base country editing technology can be used to completely treat depression or early dementia, but experts caution that this may obliterate the creativity of patients, and the application of gene editing technology may also cause ethical issues.Once gene editing technology is popularized, parents will use it to "optimize" their children, and the modified genes will inevitably be passed on to future generations, and the "transgenic people" in the movie will appear.Researchers said, "Once this started, We ca nt look back, we must not cross this boundary.Humans can use gene editing technology to treat diseases and produce food and medicine for the benefit of humans, but if this technology is not used properly, it will cause various problems.Today, with the rapid development of science and technology, only by keeping a clear head can human beings continue to progress.
Answer: A.Unexpected consequences of misusing gene editing technology

context: A few years ago, at the beginning of China's vigorous implementation of the "Internet +" action plan, many Western scholars were still wondering: Can China's economic source "re-inject living water" only by transforming and upgrading traditional industries? The "butterfly change" from selling products to providing intelligent equipment takes the Chinese economy again, and they may be able to see more clearly: The thinking of China's transformation is not just to activate "old kinetic energy", but also to cultivate "new kinetic energy".According to the Wall Street Journal, "China used to be famous for cheap labor, and now it has something else to contribute to the worldinnovation." The "tinder" of innovation that is constantly spreading is becoming the "second stage" of China's miracle.New kinetic energy.
Answer: A.Western scholars are self-defeating

context: With the quiet melting of sea ice, it is becoming easier and easier to enter the Arctic Ocean.Arctic resources that were not economically exploitable have also emerged as "ice surfaces." The Arctic is known as the "Second Middle East." Resources are also oil and natural gas.57 million years ago, the Arctic Ocean had a warm climate and lush biodiversity.Scientists drilled and sampled on the ridges of the Arctic Ocean bottom, and found thick organics of ferns and plankton in the sediment.Layer, found a large number of plankton and other organic matter in the carbon-rich black core.This carbon-rich sediment is the prerequisite for the formation of oil.Sure enough, since the 1960s, people have successively been on the Arctic Ocean shelf.Abundant oil and gas are found in the marginal sea.
Answer: A.Oil and gas are the richest natural resources in the Arctic

context: When the style of writing is prosperous, the public's interest in archeology will also be unprecedented, so it is not difficult to understand the desire of cultural officials and cultural relics scholars, and even ordinary people to solve the mysteries of ancient times from the new discoveries of archeology.It is already very embarrassing, and it is often distressing.If even local governments start to ignore rules and laws and let their preferences break through the earth, the wind will be unstoppable if the wind is long.If Divine Land is buried in large tombs, it will not However, disrespect to the ancestors is also a failure to the future generations, and it is also a blasphemy of the archeological discipline, because no generation has the right to dig the tomb in the "temporary rise", and no generation has the freedom to end the culture of the future Curious right.
Answer: A.Archaeology is in great crisis

context: In recent years, in the process of implementing new curriculum reforms in the education sector, vigorously implementing quality education, and reducing the burden on students, parents in individual places have become "assistants" of school teachers, and homework has evolved into "parent work." Checking and signing assignments, helping children to recite poems to listen to lower grade children telling stories, making handwritten reports, completing small productions, etc.From the perspective of education and teaching rules, checking assignments, discovering errors in children's homework and urging them to correct It is a teacher's responsibility and a professional matter.Most parents do not have such a professional level.Even if they are qualified, they do not necessarily have time.Forcing parents to be "assistant teachers" not only makes parents difficult, but also touches on teachers' basics.The moral bottom line has changed the flavor of the home-school relationship.
Answer: A.The phenomenon of "parent work" does not conform to the laws of education and teaching

context: Compared with other mass spectrometry technologies, time-of-flight mass spectrometer is easy to operate and can be used even by those who have no professional training in analytical chemistry.Especially in recent years, the development of applications such as pathogenic microorganism identification and mass spectrometry has made it more and more clinically tested.It is favored in the field.For example, the previous microbial identification was completed by biochemical culture, which is time-consuming and low in detection accuracy, but now it is faster, higher throughput, and more accurate to identify from the proteome level by time-of-flight mass spectrometry.In addition, traditional protein molecules are mostly detected by immunoassay methods, which require the help of third-party antibodies.The antibody and the test object are first subjected to an immunochemical reaction, and then detected by an instrument.The method is complex and easy to cause false detection.Positive, while the time-of-flight mass spectrometer can directly detect the molecules of the test object.
Answer: A.Biochemical culture takes less time

context: There is a saying that there is a "reward circuit" about sugar in the human brain, that is, sugar intake, which can cause the brain to secrete a substance that makes people happy.Dopamine is that clever salesman who makes you unknowingly I m stuck in the sugar trap.However, excessive intake of anything can have adverse effects.Studies have found that the consequences of long-term high sugar may not only lead to physical obesity, but also psychological depression.But it is important to understand the food and the relationship between the human body and mind is not a overnight effort.It will be a long-term study.
Answer: A.Dopamine is the physiological basis for happiness

context: With the great changes in the media, the drama-watching platform has gradually developed to the Internet and mobile terminals.The "Internet generation" has grown into a mainstream audience.The migration of the main audience has inevitably affected the performance style of TV dramas.Although young people do have a flying imagination They are favored, but they also have requirements for the values, realism, and artistry of works of art.Just like the heroes in the animation world and the changing spirits, no matter how wild they are, they always watch history and reality to trigger The viewer's thinking on life issues and social issues is the background.On the contrary, the thunder drama, detached from the logic of life, and disregards the truth of history, in addition to causing stigma, it can not make people get a deeper aesthetic experience.
Answer: A.The performance style of the TV drama reflects the taste of the main audience

context: Right now, the real estate market is on a stable and orderly track, and the "credit bonus" of the real estate industry is gradually disappearing.If the phenomenon of steady and falling house prices occurs, then the "credit bonus" of the real estate industry is likely to be transformed into " "Credit risk".So, financial institutions that place their hopes on the real estate industry may face much greater risks than lending to the real economy.In this case, why not adjust the credit concept as soon as possible and put support for the real economy on financial institutions.Prominent position, by supporting the real economy to effectively reduce risks and find new space for benefit growth.It is also because of this that we expect regulators to change and upgrade punishment methods, from punishing only specific violations to those that do not implement central decision-making.Punishment.
Answer: A.Think that the real economy is more worthy of lending by financial institutions

context: From the perspective of the population's spatial layout, urbanization is the transfer of rural population to towns and the transformation of farmers to citizens.The process of farmers to citizens is the process of modernizing the quality of human beings.The modernization of human qualities cannot be separated from modernization Education.The modernization of human education is the foundation and support of urbanization.Urbanization also means the transfer of people's employment and production from the agricultural sector to industry and services.The modernization of human production methods is an essential feature of urbanization.It is the essence of human modernization, and the foundation that supports the modernization of human production methods is the popularization of modern vocational education.
Answer: A.Urbanization is the modernization of human production methods

context: With the improvement of equipment information, unlike the original blind technology stacking, installing phased array radar for aircraft carriers now seems to have become a necessary "retro style".However, with Britain and Russia, phased array radar will be deployed.It is different on the bridge, whether it is the original "Enterprise" or the latest "Ford" class aircraft carrier.They have a phased array radar under the bridge to ensure that the bridge has sufficient height.This layout of U.S.aircraft carrier bridges will limit the detection range of phased array radar, but the United States, the world's leading carrier, knows which phased array radar and bridge are more important.
Answer: A.At the height of the bridge, there is a certain gap between Britain, Russia, and the United States.

context: Big data is an important tool for scientific decision-making and a means of predicting the future with high accuracy.Data is a tool for recording human behavior.Making predictions and references to the future by big data technology is the result of human development.However, interpersonal communication and Communication should not be abandoned because of big data technology, but rely too much on the prediction and reasoning of big data, and abandon the process of interpersonal communication, which will inevitably lead to the weakening of interpersonal communication, which will affect people's free will.
Answer: A.Big data is an important tool for scientific decision-making

context: History of humankind is the history of interaction between man and nature, science and society.In the long course of civilization, science was only the interest of "leisure people", and the popularity of science was impossible to talk about.People were in the imprisonment of "non-science".Groping.With the rise of modern science, human beings have deepened their understanding of nature, and the relationship between science and society has become increasingly close.The spread of science has grown stubbornly at the junction of man and nature, and between science and society.Light.
Answer: A.The interaction between man and nature, science and society has greatly promoted the popularization of science

context: In primitive society, people sang and danced, but did not write poems, because there was no text at that time.Similarly, people in prehistoric times also performed plays, and most of the Chinese drama actors were illiterate after the words were written.However, for a long time, people have fallen into the trap of writing and literature worship, and even the textual research has always become the history of literature, the most highly regarded research method in the history of drama, and the most effective approach to historical reality.If there is "new material" in the field of theater history research, it must be more than just literature.
Answer: A.The study of the history of drama needs to update ideas and innovate research methods

context: Through an in-depth study of the communication links between dolphins, scientists have discovered that the concept of entropy in Zipf's law and information theory can serve the analysis of extraterrestrial signals.After receiving any suspicious signals outside the ground, you should first use Zip Huf's law to analyze whether there is a certain straight line feature of the slope.If there is a certain feature, it proves that it is not meaningless noise.Then entropy analysis is performed, so that you can know the complexity of the communication without deciphering the signal.A suspicious signal, not only has a linear feature with a slope of -1 in the Zipf coordinate system, but also has a high-order entropy value, then this signal is most likely to be the long-term extraterrestrial civilization we are looking for.
Answer: A.Research finds communication between dolphins is very similar to alien signals

context: Scientists have found a superbright supernova in a galaxy 10 billion light-years away, which erupted about 3.5 billion years after the Big Bang, during what the astronomers called the "noon of the universe".Ordinary supernovas are the days when massive stars die.It is caused by a violent explosion.The brightness of superbright supernovae is 10 to 100 times higher than that of ordinary supernovae, and the formation mechanism is not clear at present.The galaxies where superbright supernovas found in the past are all relatively small, making scientists think that small galaxies lack heavy elements The environment is conducive to the generation of superbright supernovae.The galaxy found in this superbright supernova is an ordinary mass galaxy, which makes people rethink the formation of superbright supernovae.This means that the Milky Way may also have the conditions to generate superbright supernovae .
Answer: A.Super-bright supernova occurred during the most intense "noon of the universe" during star formation

context: In recent years, a "fish oil fever" has emerged in the health product market.Fish oil is unsaturated fatty acids.Proper consumption of unsaturated fatty acids can prevent the occurrence of arteriosclerosis and reduce the symptoms of arteriosclerosis.On the one hand, fish oil can regulate blood lipids and reduce Total cholesterol and "bad cholesterol"-low-density lipoprotein cholesterol.On the other hand, fish oil can improve memory and protect the retina.It is said that high-dose intake of fish oil can effectively lower blood pressure in patients with hypertension, but some researchers concluded that 31 A foreign study found that although a large daily intake of fish oil can slightly reduce blood pressure, if the dosage is too large, it will stimulate the human gastrointestinal tract.In addition, excessive intake of fish oil will also be converted into human fat storage, Makes people fat, which negatively affects the body.
Answer: A.Daily intake of fish oil does not lower blood pressure

context: The Internet has profoundly changed the way media is produced.The media environment presents three major trends: "mobile, social, and visual." The influence of these trends on the creation of online media is the foundation of the fan economy.The media are more rapid and convenient.It is closer to the psychological distance of fans, and the degree of organization of fans has greatly improved, which enables fans to more smoothly participate in the life of idols, and even change the life status and acting career of idols.In cultural industries such as TV series, fans The flow economy has been the main thrust of the industry: the price of single drama series has risen from 2.4-5 million to 4-10 million, and the increase has been paid by fans, and the artist's film pay and copyright fees have skyrocketed.
Answer: A.Fan economy was born based on online media

context: The key to whether there is craftsmanship is to see if there is an ingenuity that is obscured and obsessed with the pursuit of excellence.To build a craftsmanship, we must adhere to the original intention, persist in concentration, uphold the heart of the child, abandon the impetuous hustle and bustle, and sit in our post., Well done.How can you sit and do well? The key is to focus on the pursuit of perfection and perfect every detail of the product as much as possible.
Answer: A.Educational craftsmen are the foundation of inheriting the spirit of craftsmen

context: In fact, most people are living along an inherent set of paths and habits, that is, "comfort zone", and tend not to break it.Especially under the influence of Internet culture, it is easier for people to hold similar views People warm up in groups, strengthen the original cognitive method, and enhance the sense of security.There are so many uncertain factors in life.Keeping it open while keeping it open will have more opportunities to embrace a beautiful ending.Because you can't figure out at what point you will open up and become a very strange but happy yourself.
Answer: A.Break the "comfort zone" and enjoy the uncertainty of life, you will gain more happiness

context: The data monopoly of artificial intelligence raises new practical problems for antitrust theory.In other words, the theoretical innovation of antitrust law is a real practical requirement.Specifically, the theoretical innovation needs of antitrust law mainly include the following: Aspect: First, the bilateral market theory.Corresponding to the unilateral market, the bilateral market theory proposed by economists can provide useful ideas for antitrust enforcement in multilateral data markets.The current bilateral market theory requires attention on the one hand Practice trends further improve the theory itself.On the other hand, we need to explore how bilateral market theory can be translated into applicable antitrust laws and regulations.Second, relevant market theory.Data antitrust of artificial intelligence needs to explore the definition of a "data market" separately.Necessity and feasibility, we also need to face the inability of traditional related market definition tools in the data market, and then actively explore alternative analytical tools
Answer: A.Legal origin

context: Now I often hear a saying that IQ is not equal to EQ.Where one can go and what achievements are, the key lies in EQ.This "emotional quotient determinism" is very arrogant and suspicious.Around us, no matter in life, Still at work, as long as one's things are not done well, they will be linked to the lack of EQ.In fact, we all exaggerate the role of EQ, ignore IQ, strength, and diligence, thinking that as long as you play EQ, you can go back and forth.It s actually not true.EQ is important when people are in the workplace, but the decisive factors are IQ and talent.Playing with EQ can make you exquisite, but after all, you ca nt play actual performance or scientific research results.A person has real talents to learn.Strong skills and hard work, then emotional intelligence is actually the icing on the cake.
Answer: A.IQ is more important than EQ in the workplace

context: Acacia spp.It is an alias of the genus Aceraceae, which belongs to the genus Aceraceae of the family Aceraceae.It grows in forests or sparse forests at an altitude of 1000 to 2000 meters and can reach up to 15 meters.Compound leaves; white flowers bloom in early summer, androgyny, panicles; the fruit is divided into two small nuts, each with broad wings and shape like money.Due to the indiscriminate felling of forest trees, adult money maple plants are extremely rare, plus Natural regeneration is weak and it is difficult to grow young trees.They need protection like giant pandas.
Answer: A.Money maple is treasured like a giant panda

context: There are more than 15,000 marine protected areas in the world, and most of the protected areas allow commercial activities.Human beings have fully utilized or even overexploited 89% of the world's fish resources and destroyed nearly half of the world's coral reefs.Scientists believe that To protect the healthy diversity of marine life, at least 30% of the world's oceans need to be assigned to protected areas.It is important that most protected areas be close to the prosperous coast.If a sea area is isolated for a sufficient period of time, there will be many fish and organisms.A rebound will occur.Prosperous fish will gradually spread to adjacent waters.Intelligent protected areas can even make marine ecology more resilient under various pressures (such as pollution, warming and acidification).
Answer: A.Strengthening the construction of marine protected areas

context: Air pollution has blocked normal communication between plants and insects, and this has a greater impact on pollinating insects such as bees.Although, as far as the number of bee populations is affected, no one can take it at this stage.A complete monitoring data was produced, but the study found that the common plant volatile substance myrcene is easily destroyed by diesel exhaust, and the lack of myrcene can disorient bees on their way to find a honey source.After myrcene was removed, only 37% of bees could still identify where the honey was.
Answer: A.Air pollution seriously damages bee survival

context: Why do dogs hide their mouths under their forelimbs when they sleep, and cats squeeze their ears under their forelimbs when they sleep? Animals use sensory organs to detect changes in the surrounding environment and respond differently to different changes.Dogs' sense of smell is particularly sensitive.To identify some objects, military dogs also rely on their sense of smell to judge hostility and identify paths.For a dog, its nose is the most valuable, so when it sleeps, hide its mouth and nose with its forelimbs to protect it, and use its nose to be alert to surrounding movement Once there is a situation, you can use your nose to identify it immediately, and you can also use screams to demonstrate.The cat's hearing is particularly sensitive.It uses hearing to detect changes in the surroundings.When it catches mice, it uses hearing to detect the location of the mouse.For example, its ears are the most precious, so when it sleeps, it squeezes the ears under the forelimbs to protect the ears on the one hand and stick the ears to the ground on the other hand, and once it hears the sound, it can take action immediately.After the human family, cats and dogs still maintain this sleeping position.
Answer: A.Cats are better than dogs in terms of hearing; dogs are better than cats in terms of smell

context: The formation of stars requires gas.In star clusters, because a large amount of gas will be dissipated in the early stage of star cluster formation, star clusters have been considered to be unable to form new stars.Only collisions or mergers between stars are likely to be old.Stars replenish burning matter.They look younger than the rest of the stars.Stars formed by collisions or mergers are called blue discrete stars, and their name comes from their very different evolutionary processes compared to most stars.This keeps them out of the evolutionary trajectory of theoretical predictions.A research team used observational data to study the blue discrete stars in the young star cluster NGC.2173, and for the first time observed an unusual group of blue discrete stars in this young cluster.According to the discovery, this star cluster contains blue discrete stars formed by sudden bursts.
Answer: A.Star formation requires gas

context: Landfills are breeding grounds for anaerobic bacteria and produce a large amount of methane.Methane has a stronger greenhouse effect than carbon dioxide.Although it can be captured and converted into energy, even the most efficient recovery system still has up to 10% Methane escapes.Because most of the methane produced in landfills comes from organic waste, it can be treated in a greener way.The simplest way is to compost.In fact, two-thirds of the waste in the landfill can Composting, which greatly reduces the production of methane.Due to the high temperature and pressure generated during the composting process, the carbon in organic waste may be partially converted into carbon dioxide and carbon monoxide.So we can consider recombining these organic substances into liquid fuel (ethanol or ethanol) Methanol), or as other industrial raw materials.
Answer: A.Methane has more greenhouse effect than carbon dioxide
